153b1: gzos pa dang / bram ze dang byam bdag gis mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa 'di ci lags/ wa'i sha'o// ni 'phags pa dag kyang bya'i gamanabs sam/ ba'onas sbas pa dang / dedag 'dra bar gyur nas daltar gyur ba dag slong dag
153b2: gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni yus te/ dge slong dag de bas na wa'i sham za shig/ dge slong dag gis wa'i sha zos na 'das pa dang
153b3: bcas par 'gyur ro/ / gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ 'dze ti'i tshal bun ste'u zhig shing gnas shing kar rmA ba las lhung nas dus 'das te/ drug sde dag gis rje'u zhig gi nang du bcug ste 'tshed pa dang / bud med gzhan zhig du chung ngun/
153b4: stor nas de tshol zhing 'dze ta'i tshal nga 'ongs na drug sde rnams rje'u'i nang du spre'u btsas pa mthong ngo // mthong nas des drug sde dag gis bdag gi bu 'dir ma bcos sam snyam bsams te rtog pa la zhugs pa dang / ji tsam nag na ljang lhung khar ba dang /
153b5: spre'u'i lag pa gyen du byung ba dang / des brang brdungs te kyi hud bu kye bungad bu zhes smras pa dang / de'i rkang pa yang byung ste/ kyi hud bu kyi hu bu zhes yang smras pa dang / drug sde dag gis ci'i phyir de ltar byed ces smras pa dang / des gang lag byung
153b6: ba 'di ni bdag ga bu'o zhes smras pa dang / ji tsam nas 'jug ma yang byung ngo // drug snga dag gis ci khyod kyi bu mjug ma yod dam zhes smras pa dang / de sbyangs te smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di ni spre'u 'am/ de dag gis smras pa spre'u'o//
153b7: 'phags pa dag spre sha yang mnapas sam/ des tha'o nas smras pa dang / de dag 'phya bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dge smra'un
153b8: mi sha dang 'das/ de bas na dge slong dag sla'i gam tha shig/ dge slong dag gis spre'u sha zas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// byang pa'i sgo dang po ma de'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa'o/

154a1: mdor na/ phor bu gos dang lpags pa dang / 'dab ma'i phor bus mi sbyin no// lcags kyi sbu bu ma gtogs par/ nor bu khang bas btang ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i 'dze ta'i tshal mgon med
154a2: zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshen mnyan du yod pa na dge slong gzhan zhig na ste/ de rab tund kyis gzir nas de sman pa'i drung du stong ste nad med cig ces nas bzhin bzangs bdag ni rnam pa 'di lta bu zhig can par
154a3: gyur na sman gyi thabs ston cig ces smras pa dang / sman pas 'phags pa mas gtang ba'i sman gyis shig ces smras pa dang / des bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo zhes smras pa dang / 'phags pa khyed kyi ston pa ni thugs
154a4: rje can lags kyis rjes su gnang bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste sman pas bsgo la des sos par byur rnams gang
154a5: ba byos shig de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mas btang ba'i sman thong shig ces gsungs pa dang / de dag gis phor bus blugs pa dang po snyam rung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bor bus mazugs
154a6: shig ces gsungs pa dang / gos kyi mtha' mas blugs pa dang de yang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gos kyi mtha' mas ma blugs shig ces gsungs na/ lpags pa'i nang nas blugs pa dang
154a7: de yang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lpags pa'i nang nas ma khrugs shig ces gsungs pa dang / mdab mi'i por nang nas thugs te/ de yang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das
154a8: kyis bka' stsal pa/ / mdab ma'i phur bu'i nang nas ma thugs par klu bu'i nang nas rmugs par gyis shig/ des lcags kyi sbu bu nas thugs pa dang / de nang du bcug na rab tu tsha zhing rtsub par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

154b1: lcags kyi sgra bram gtags par dang bu'i m+b+ha bu'am/ khang pa'i sgra bus gtang bar gyis shig/ rgyang ba'i sgo dang po'i da 'a chags su bcad pa drug pa'o// mdodan/ bu ram shing dang shozhog 'brum dang // gsol bsregs pa'i drug
154b2: pa dang ni mar/ / rtsab 'bras bu sdong po lo mar bcas// thug pa thams cad blud par bya// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i 'dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyir gyi kun dga'i ra ba na bzhugs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe
154b3: dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/ btsun pa sman gcig las de nyid snga dro ba de nyid zhag bdun pa/ de nyid nam 'tsho'i bar du rung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pA li bu ram shing ni snga dro'i'o// de'i khu ba ni phyi dro ba'o// bu ram ni zhag bdun pa'o// bu ram shing
154b4: dang bu ram bsregs pa'i thal ba ni nam 'tshe'i bar du'o/ / u pA li zho ni snga dro ba'o// zho chu ni phyi dro ba'o// mar ni bdun pa'o// zho bsregs pa'i bral ba ni nam 'tsho'i bar du'o// u bA li sha ni snga dro ba'o// tshil bu ni bdun pa'o// sha bsregs pa'i thal
154b5: ba ni nam 'tsho'i bar du'o/ / u pA li ti la ni snga dro ba'o// til gyi mar ni bdun pa'o// til bsregs pa'i bral ba ni nam 'tsho'i bar du'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong zhig na bar gyur nas sman pas mthong ste/ 'phags pa gso ma'i thug
154b6: pa bros la 'thung shig ces smras pa dang / des de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams la smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar sman pas bsgo ba de bzhin du gyis shig de la the tshom du ma byed
154b7: cig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong gzhan dag cig yang na par gyur nas de dag kha cig la ni sman pas yungs dkar gyi thug pa 'thung shig ces bsgo// kha cig la ni rtsa ba'i thug pa 'thung shig ces bsgo// kha cig la ni sdong bu'i thug pa 'thung shig/
154b8: ces bsgo/ kha cig la ni 'bras bu'i thug pa 'thung shig ces bsgo ba dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na ngas rjes su gnang gis sman pas nang pa la lung bsgo

155a1: na thams cad kyi thug pa'ang 'thung shig de la the tshom dum byed cig/ rkang pa'i sgo dang po'i mdo tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'o// mdor na/ bu ram chu dang btung ba de bzhin te// zhag bdun bzhag par gyur pa dang / gzhan gyi phyir yang
155a2: bsngo ba dang / / rjes su pan gdags myang bar bya// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i 'dze ta tshal mgon med zas spyan gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs sa// bcom ldan 'das nyan mas kyi dge 'dun dang bcas te gagongs spyod cing /
155a3: gshegs pa dang / de dag ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig tu phyin te/ dbrags kyi grong do ni khyim bdag gzhan zhig gnas pa de gdul ba'i dus la bab par mkhyen nas/ bcom ldan 'das ri brags kyi grong der dbyon pa dang / khyim bdag des bcom ldan
155a4: 'das mthong nas de dad pa skyes te bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du 'angs so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang rang shin mkhyen nas ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu bshang
155a5: nas kyim bdag ngas thos pa dang / 'jig tshogs su lta ba'i ri rtsem nyi shu mthong ba legs kyi rdo rdza brtsam nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i sras bu mngon du byas so// ji tsam dge slong de dag lal gyi ralabs gzing nas log pa'i lha khang dang / bkangs dang
155a6: bskyed mos tshal dang / shing drung dag tu thos pab ste nyal zhing 'khod pa dang / khyim bdag de rab tu dang pa thob pas na bkadas dang / lha khang dang / shing drung dag tu rims kyis dge slong dag la phyag bya ba'i phying song ba dang / dge slong dag gnas na nyalani
155a7: 'dug pa des mthong nas/ 'phags pa dag bstan pa la shin tu brtson par brtsib la ci slad dun gzims shing 'khod ces smras pa dang / de dgagis kyis bdag las kyis ngam thas gci shing tam chung ste dge pa'i phyogs spong bar mi nus so/
155a8: blam pa dang / des 'phags pa rnams de ltar na ni byi dro bu ma gsol bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag 'a tshal te mchis gsol cig ces smras pa dang / de dag las khacig na de kyis bdag dalegs kyis bza' bar ba'o//

155b1: cig gis tshe dang ldan pa khyim bdag 'ber tra si dag gis bu ram bza' ba la brten nas des dgra bcom pa mngon du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin rjes su gnang na bdag cag ni de ltar lam gyi ngal bas gzir te/ 'jig rten nam dang
155b2: bdag ni grong na 'khod bzhin du za'o zhes mi dga' bar 'gyur gyis gud du 'dong ngo zhes smras pa dang / kha cig gis yang tshe dang ldan pa de ltar 'dod na bcom ldan 'das la zhwa'o zhes smras nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
155b3: gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ra bur ma ni thams cad du bza' bar bya ste/ de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad du bur mazo shig ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag gis zos pa dang / de dag las
155b4: gyi la pas skom gyis gdungs par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu ram gyi chu gyis la 'thung shig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/ btsun pa bu ram chu zhag bdun par byin gyis brlabs te
155b5: 'tshal na rang ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo // btsun pa ji tsam gyis bar du bzhag pa btung bar bgyi/ u pA li dzi tsam na dad par gyur te skyur por ma gyur cing rang bzhin ma nyams pa'i bar du'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
155b6: gso sbyin dang / tshul nas byung ba dang / chos gos byin gyis brlabs pa dang / gos bsngo ba dang / gang zag gcig po 'gron du boso pa dang / 'di lnga ni rang gis bsams pas 'grub pa zhes gsungs so// dge slong de dag gang du 'gron du bos pa
155b7: der de las gzhan du yang 'gron du bos sam de las lhag par yang rung ste/ gcig tu ni bdag nyid/ gnyis su ni bdag gi sems gtang nas gzhan btang ba'o// mu ge'i dus la bab ste dge slong rnams bsad snyoms kyis shin tu phongs par
155b8: gyur to/ / dad pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag ngag gis dge slong gnas brtan dag zas la 'gron du bos pa dang / khyim bdag gcig la khas blangs te gzhan btang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na ngas mu ge byung zhing sdug

156a8: dos 'grangs pa deng nyin par bad yid mtshan ma yang drud na yongs so/ / dge slong dag gis sman pa la dris pa dang / des mtshan mo yir 'thung shig ces smras so// dege slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'ad

156b1: kyis mtshan mo yang 'thungs shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / des mang du bsogs nas zhag bdun du byin gyis brlabs te de sos par gyur to// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong gzhan zhig nad kyis btab nas de yang sman pa'i
156b2: rlu dras pa/ nad me ga ces byas nas bzhin pa bdag la 'di la ba na cigagis pa khan ldan gyithapas ston cegacas smras so// das ngags pa 'bum cas ni/ zung sa rnams par 'gyur nas pasgo ba dang / deH
156b3: zlang ba dge slong dag la smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste ldan pas 'brumar 'thung gi ga ces bstan 'brumar 'thung shing / dge slong des 'azungs pa dang /
156b4: nyin par mos kyang mtshan mo yang drung nang langs so// dge slong dag gis sman pa la dris pa dang / des mtshan mo yang 'thung shigaces bskor// dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gas la nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka stsal pa/
156b5: mtshan mo yang 'alung shig/ des 'brum ba sogs te zhag bdun du byin gyis brlabs nas 'azungs pa dang sos par gyur to// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pan / dge slong gzhan zhig nad kyis btab pa dang / de yang sman pa'i drung du song nas na
156b6: med cig ces smras nas/ bzhin bzangs bdag la nad 'di lta bu zhig gis btab na sman gyi thabs ston cig ces smras so// des mar ram 'bru mar 'di tsam zhig 'thungs na sos par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang / de bshes nyung bas btsal kyang
156b7: ma rnyed nas yang sman pa'i drung du song nas bzhin bzangs khyod kyis bsgo yang kho bos 'bru mar yang ma rnyed na mar lhag la rnyed/ gzhan lta cung zad ni rung ston cig ces smras pa dang / des 'phags pa 'di zhes bya ba'i dge slong zhig gi 'bru mar
156b8: sbyar na/ 'di zhes bya ba zhig gas mar sbyar gyis de'i gan du song dang / gal te sbyar ba de'i lhag pa yod kyang srid do zhes smras pa dang / de dag gi drung du song nas bslang sa na/ de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa de nag bdun las 'das te/ spags par

157a1: gyur pase med do zhes smras pa dang / de de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag la smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nad pa'i thabs rtogs la mar ram 'bru mar
157a2: gzhan ci yang rung bzhag pa yang blas bza' bar bya ste/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mar ram 'bru mar ram gzhan ci yang rung bzhag pa yang blas zo shig/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig ces bka' stsal pa/ byin len byed pa
157a3: med do/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byin len byed pa'i mi med na byin len ma byas kyang blas zo shig/ gang gi tshe na ba na gnang ba de sos nas ma spyod cig/ spyad na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod
157a4: pa na ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mig sman gyi snod gab tshe tshangs shig ces bka' stsal na/ ci 'dra ba bcad par bgyi/ u pA li rin po ci las byas pa ma
157a5: gtogs so/ / yang zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yul yangs pa na mi rung ba rnam pa bcu spong la/ rung ba'i khang pa byin gyis brlab par gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa/ ci btsun pa 'ang pa 'og rung bar byin gyis brlabs na khang
157a6: pa'i steng yang rung bar byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ram/ / u pA li ji ltar steng gi bzhin du ngos kyi yang brjod par bya'o// rkyang ba'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa'o//
157a7: mdor na/ rtsa sdong lo ma 'bras bu rnams// thams cad chang gis spangs pa dang // kha zas med par bkrus pa dang // yang na zas ngan de bzhin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i dngos po shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga'i ra ba na
157a8: bzhugs so/ / gang gi tshe rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya'i rigs re re zhing yang shAkya lnga brgya zhig bcom ldan 'das kyis g.yog tu phul ba dang / de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu phyung ngo // de dag sngon lus chang gis

157b1: gsos pas na de dag chad med nas lus la nad zhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la kun dga' bo ci'i phyir na shAkya dag rnyirI por gyur ces bka' stsal
157b2: pa dang de ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la zhib mor gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar na ngas gnang ba ni chang du 'gyur ba rtsa ba dang sdong po la sogs pa bskams la phye mar gyis te ras dkar po'i nang du thum pong
157b3: gyis la chang gi mthu zhil ba rdza ma ma gang ba'i nang du lcags shig/ de nas slar phyung ste lag pa khrus la chu kha zas med pa dang sres te 'dod par tshogs la 'thung shig de skom na snga dro yang rung / phyi dro yang rung ste the tshom ma byed par 'thung shig/
157b4: de ltar byos dang de dag chang la sred pa dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro// dge slong khyed ston pa nga la dmigs na ni chang ma 'thung shig/ ma glang rtsig/ rtswa mchog gis kyang ma reg shig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyam du yod pa na ste/ dge slong gzhan zhig/
157b5: na bar gyur nas de la sman pas zas ngan pa byin cig ces bsgo ba dang / de la dge slong kha cig gis ni shes kyi kha cig gis mi shes pa de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa u pA li la dris pa dang / des de dag zhib tu smras so// sangs rgyas
157b6: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong swa te kha zas ngan pa byin cig ces gsungs pa ni ci de yang byin len bgyi 'tshal lam/ u pA li de yang byin len byos shig/ su las
157b7: byin len bgyi/ u pA li de ni dge bsnyen dang ba las so// rkyang ba'i sgo dang po'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa ste/ sgo dang po rdzogs s+ho// // mdor bsdus par na/ snod dang chos gos gnyi ga dang // ko sa la dang sar
157b8: ba de bzhin te/ / bsgrags dang chos gos sna tshogs dang // lhan cig pa yang dge slong ma rnams ni// tha mar byas te bsdus pa'i mdor gsungs so// / mdor na/ snod dang yo byad gtsug lag khang // 'dron pa

158a1: mad ma lags rnams dang / / gas gdugs dang zhan gang// dur khrod pa dadung bzhan spangs// sangasargyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du so pa ma thag/ sa sas sbyin gyi na dga' ban bcwa
158a2: de'i tshen khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig du yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa'i gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la bral lo// de namal stan dang / snod spya mang du gyur/ dge slong
158a3: nazung du gnas te/ de'i nang nas kha cig gis tshe dang ldan pa dag ma la snyan dang / snod spyad dang / yo byad ma stang na de dag rgyud zos par 'gyur gyis/ de dag las bdag cag la spyad par ci tsam dgos pa de tsam zhag bcangs la/ de'i wA
158a4: mnams ni gtsug lag khang gzhan du dbul lo zhes smras nas/ de dag gis de bzhin byas so// ji tsam zhigau na bsod snyoms pa gzhan zhig gnongs spyad pa spyod cing gtsug lag khang der 'ongs pa dang / dge slong de dag gis ngal bso
158a5: bcug nas de yang nga 'dun de dag gi na na rgan pa zhig ste/ gtsug lag khang du lam gyi dal bso nas des de dag la tshe dang ldan pa mal stan mchis sam zhes smras na/ med do zhes smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis ji ltar yin pa

164a5: bdag 'di na ga ma chag par dag slong gau tam la sbyin par gyur nas bdag cag la rabaca dad par gyur te/ de ni bdag cag gi rnye bas sbyid pa / gas bag cag gi dge 'dun gyi rigs la rab rtsa dad par gyur te snyam nas des la
164a6: blangs so/ / de nas khyim bdag me skyes de dag spyan drangs nas song ngo // de nas khyim bdag me skyes kyis de'i nub mo rab tu bsod pa'i bca'ab dang bza' ba'i kha zas dag sbyar nas/ nang par sngar langs te langs
164a7: nas stan bting / ril bdag chus bkang ste bzhag nas gang po dag la spyan 'dren pa'i dus gsol pa/ kye gang po bshos rnams bshams kyis dus mkhyen par mdzod cig/ de dag dong ba dang / dpal sbed
164a8: kyis de'i gnas su 'ongs te smras pa/ / 'phags pa gang po dge sbyong gau ta ma ni khyim bdag gi khyim du bzhud de de nang du bzhud gar sgo'i them pa la zhabs bzhag nas 'dzum pa ston te/ de nas nyan thos kun dga' bo zhes bya bas

164b1: stong g.yogs phyogs gcig tu bzar/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dag ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/
164b2: btsun pa ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis mdzum pa mdzad ces zhus pa dang / des kyang kun dga' bo de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dag ni rgyu med / rkyen med par 'jum pa
164b3: ston par mi mdzad de/ de ji lta bur dgongs pa bzhin lung bstan to zhes smras nas/ de la skye bo mang po dag kyang rab tu dad par gyur gyis khyod kyis kyang khyim bdag me skyes kyis khyim du 'gro ba'i tshe de ltar bya ba'i rigs so//
164b4: 'on kyang skye bo mang po dag rab tu dad par 'gyur ro// des khas blangs so// de nas gang po gcer bu ba mang pos bskor nas khyim bdag me skyes kyi khyim du phyin pa dang / khyim bdag me skyes kyi sgo'i them pa la rkang pa
164b5: bzhag ste rta gad du bgad pa dang / de'i nang nas gcer bu ba gcig cig gis rkang pa la btud de bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa khyod lta bu rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi 'dzad do zhes dris pa dang / kye chu bo dregs bral
164b6: kyi 'gram na spre'u pho zhig gis spre'u mo zhig mthong nas de la sems rab tu chags te spre'u mo de la rgal lo snyam nas brgyugs pa dang gred de shing gi rtse mo nas rdeg 'chos nas dus 'das so/ / de'i tshe nga 'di snyam du sems te/
164b7: sems can 'di ni 'dod pa'i rgyus sdug bsngal ba cher gyur to snyam mo// de skad du kha nas byung ma thag tu khyim bdag ma skyes kyis thos nas des bsams pa/ bu zan mo'i bu gang po ni khab 'tshong ba slar khabardung ba'i
164b8: khyim du khab 'tshong bar sems pa bzhin te/ ji nas 'di la rgyal ka zhig bya'o snyam nas de dag rgyu su can mang po thams cad bde bar 'dug pa dang / khyim bdag des gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bca' ba dang bza' bas par

165a4: mi mthong ste/ / dregs bral 'gram gyi sde mthong la// bor bu'i nang gi tshod ma min// gang po yang de'i gdong zhes pa dang / des por bani nabs na mod ma 'jug pa bstan te/ gang po khyod kyis chu ba drogs bral gyi 'gram
165a5: na spre'u 'dug pa ni mthong / phor bu'i nang na tshod ma 'dug pa ni ma mthong ngo zhes smras pa dang / des bsams pa/ 'dis padag skyongs par byas kyis ci nas kyang 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol gnyi gar phan par mi 'gyur ba de ltar sbyin/
165a6: pa'i yon tan brjod do snyam du bsams pa dang / me skyes kyis de skyengs par shes nas sbyin pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i tshe de'i mdun du ma 'dug go/ des zan zos nas sbyin pa'i yon tan blags pa/ sbyin bdag gis ni
165a7: sbyin pa'i dus/ dge sbyong gzhan ni za ba'i dus// lhag ma gzhan la 'ong ba'i dus// bsod nams mi dge yod ma yin// sgo ba zhig 'dug pa des sbyin pa'i yon tan brjod pa la nyan nyan te thos nas khros pa
165a8: 'di 'dra ba'i sdig can zas zos la bsrung yang mi nus te/ 'di 'dra ba'i sbyin pa'i yon tan lta ga la srid kyis bu zan mo'i bu 'di la rgyal ka zhig bya'o snyam nas des 'bras khu bum pa gang sgo drung du po'o// sgo gtan gyi ge dang

165b1: byed tsam drangs te bzhag pa dang gcer bu ba de phyir byung ba dang 'bras khu las phreng de glang bsgo gtan la po gnas khrag byung ngo / / de nas sgo ba des mthong ste/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sgog tan byung ba'i dus la bab/
165b2: 'bras bu pho ba'i dus bab pas// mgo ba snang ba'i dus yin gyis/ dge dang mi dge'i dus med do// de glang bal khrag zag bzhin du khyim bdag dpal sbed gang na ba der song ste drung du phyin pa dang / dpal sbed
165b3: kyis mthong nas btsun pa gang po ci nyes shes dris pa dang / des smras pa/ me skyes kyis 'di 'dra bar gnod par byas so// dpal sbed kyis spras pa dang / khyod ni gson por thar gyis sdod cig dang / ci nas
165b4: 'di ltar dge sbyong gau ta ma nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par kho bo'i khyim nas gson bzhin du phyir mi 'byung bar byas mi dgar ma byed cig/ dpal sbed kyis bsams pa/ 'di'i dgra la lan glan gyis spyan 'dren du 'gro'o//
165b5: de ste/ dge sbyong gau ta ma de thams cad mkhyen pa yin na ni 'gron du bos kyang khas len tu mi btub bo// de ste thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin na ni khas len to snyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa
165b6: dang / bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu dga' ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag dpal sbed kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol

166a5: sa rnas pa dang / denas dpal srid kyis bsams pa/ 'di yang me skyes kyi gnyen du'adaH/ dge sbyong ga tam lang yas / shor bar 'gyur ro/ snyas nas das ma mdzad byin pa cag ce mo
166a6: bcug nas gnags/ gang po las sogs pa gcer bru ba thams cad thos nas byangs dgra bsad pa la lhor shog shig/ dge sbyong gau ta ma gsang ba'i phyir sgong dorang chen po bshes nas nang du meng ldeng gis
166a7: bdag gis bkang ste banag/ kha zas dang skom gyi nang du'ang drug non pos bkad// de dag med rab tu dga' nas myur zhing rings su dang sde yang thog gi steng du mdzes te 'khod nas dang bdag cag bde bar
166a8: ma 'khodado/ / dge sbyong gau ta ma mo'i dong gnang du ji ltar tshig pa dang / drag non pas rab tuzhen pa dang / yan lan du sa la de ltar 'brel ba dag blta'o// dpal sbed kyis gdan bting nas bcom ldan 'das stsa/

166b1: 'dren pas dus gsol te/ gau ta ma bshes kyang sbyar lags kyis/ kye gau ta ma dus la bab par dgongs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la
166b2: dge slong dag la 'di skad dpal sbed kyi khyim du de bzhin gshegs pa ma gshegs par dge slong su yang sngar ma 'dod shig/ btsun pa de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan ste/
166b3: dge slong dag la tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal sbed kyi khyim du de bzhin gshegs pa ma gshegs par snga ma dge slong su yang ma 'dod shig ces bka' stsal to zhes bsgo'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga
166b4: dro'i dus nams thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos bsdams te/ dge slong mang pos bkad nas dge slong gi dge 'du mdun du byas te dpal sbed kyi khyim gang na ba de logs su gshegs so//
166b5: de nas 'od ma'i tshal na gnas pa'i lha bran rnams sdug bsngal zhing yid mi dga' bas gzir te/ srung zhing rings par bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la gtugs te
166b6: snying rje'i tshig gis 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das dpal sbed kyi khyim du gshegs pa'i mi rigs so zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lha de na gnod pa ci zhig yod/ bcom ldan 'das
166b7: bcom ldan 'das la ma rung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bshams so zhes smras pa dang / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnod pa thams cad dang / bral na des nga la gnod pa ci zhig byar
166b8: yad/ lha bran gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das des bcom ldan 'das bgrongs pa'i slad du dong chen po'i nang du seng ldeng gi me ma dag gis bkad do zhes smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha gang 'dod

167a1: chags kyi me dang ge sdang gi ma dang / gti mug gi me dag kyang ye shes kyi chus btapa na gi bar 'gyur/ sa'i nang na ma des cigag kyang yod kyis mya ngan ma byed par jug shig/ sa bran gyis gsol bde gcig bus lags kyi gzhan dag gis
167a2: bcom ldan 'das bkrongs pa'i spang dubyab bya te/ drug non pami bza pas pazas dang zung ba'i dad gyur to zhes byas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar bum pa/ su drug gi garten po ye shes kyis 'dod chags kyi dgadang/ zhe sdang gi drug dang /
167a3: gti mug gi drag kyang rab tu btang / rab tu sngags/ rab tu bor na dug gi nang na thas des byar ci zhig yod/ bdag slar log la bdag gi las la nan tan byos shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu byon pa dang / rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i lha dag zla
167a4: snga ma bzhin du gsol pa dang / lha de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis lham snga ma bzhin du bsgo ste slar bkye'o// de nas dpal sbed kyi khang pa'i sgor byon pa dang dpal sbed kyi khyim gyi lhas snga ma bzhin du gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha de dag kyang lha snga ma bzhin du
167a5: bsgo ste slar bkye'o/ / de nas dpal sbed kyi chud mas bsams pa/ de ni bcom ldan 'das sgo dang por phyin cing de tsam ni dong gi steng du zhabs gzhog go// de tsam ni dong gi kha rtas g.yogs pa'i stang nas lhung sted tsam ni bcom ldan 'das me'i nang du lhung bas rud pas kyang
167a6: 'tshal/ mchi ma yang byung / me lces chos gos tshig pa'i dud pa'ang byung ngo snyam nas mi dga' ba nges khang pa'i nang du bcug pa yid mi dga' ba skyes nas mig mchi mas gang zhing do 'dzum gnags nas brdabs mi dge ba la rtog ste ngu zhing 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das
167a7: sems can thams cad la phan pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i yid kyi bsgo bar mar pon nas me'i dong gi steng du napas bzhag pa dang / de nas me'i dong gi snying du zhabs pa zhag ma thag tu de thams cad kyang mtshe'u pad mo can du gyur te/ ud pa la dang / pad mo dang ku su dang /
167a8: band ri ka dag gis ni khebs/ bya dang ba dang / kar na da dang / drar ba la sogs pargyan spyod pa'i bya rnams kyis brgyan te/ bya de dag kyang skad sna tshogs 'byon pa ni ji ltar lha'i rdzing man dag bzhin no// nam ma'i la gnas pa'i lha dag gis kyang lha'i metog ku sur

167b1: dang / lha'i me tog kha dog dang ldan pas steng nas gtor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i snying po'i steng dag tu zhabs bzhag ste dpal sbed kyi khyim du byon pa dang / khyim bdag dpal sbed do mtshar che ba'i mig gis dgra deng bltas nas/ btsun pa gang po bcom ldan 'das
167b2: kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul la ltos shig ces smras pa dang / gang po mi dga' ba'i bzhin du bsgyur nas// khyim bdag dge sbyong gau ta ma la dadang ma de'i sgyum la dang dam zhes smras pa dang / dpal sbed kyis smras pa/ btsun pa gang po de ltar 'di lta bus bsgrub tu ru den ni khyod kyang
167b3: thams cad mkhyen pa na sgyu ma de lta bu byos la ston cig/ de lta bus nga dang de'i mdza' bo dang pu nu dag kyang bsgrubs par gyis shig/ gang pos bsams pa dgos pas grub par gyu te/ thar 'gro'o snyam nas des de la spyos te lang pa'i steng nas babs te skyengs nas bcom ldan
167b4: 'das la mngon du 'byung bar ma nus te/ de nas 'gros dal zhing bgos kyis song nas gdong yang sa la ba ltas te dpal sbed kyi khyim nas byung ste bros te song ngo // de nas khyim bdag dpal sred khyim bdag me skyes kyi sring mo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ sgo lcags phye ste
167b5: bzang mo tshur shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag tshol cig ces smras pa dang / des bsams pa/ 'di bdag la gru bar byed do snyam nas snying rje ba'i tshig gis dal nas smras pa/ sdig pa'i grogs pos slus te bsad na bdag la bag ma du ci zhig yod ces smras pa dang /
167b6: des bzang mo bden par zer te bag ma pa ni ma yin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das bkrongs par ma nus pas/ da bcom ldan 'das la mngon du 'thung bar mi nus kyis/ ra khrid lang so shig ces smras pa dang / de nas dpal sbed kyis chung mde dga' ba skyes nas mgra ba'i yid kyis dpal spang
167b7: khrid de bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsan pa bzod par mdzod cig/ khyim bdag 'di mi dge ba'i grogs pos bslus pas na bcom
167b8: ldan 'das la mi dge ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag bgyis so zhes smras pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis glang po che'i lha 'dra ba'i rtsag brgyad nas gsungs pa/ khyim bdag longs shig dang bzod do// de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mdza' ba dang dgrar bye brag mi 'byad/ de bzhin

168a1: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni mdza' ba dang / dgrar bye brag mi 'byed/ tsan dan dang sta'ur mtshungs so zhes gsungs pa dang / de nas khyim bdag dpal sred de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu dga' ba skyes nas/ mos
168a2: ba'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das la cung zad cig gzhes shig/ bdag gis bshos gdod sbyar re zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la spyan 'dren pas dus gsol to// gau ta ma bshos dag kyang sbyar lags
168a3: kyis/ kye gau ta ma dus mkhyen par mdzod cig ces zer na da yang ci'i phyir na 'di skad du sla/ des gsol ba/ btsun pa bdag ni mi dge ba'i grogs po la lta bar gyur pa'i blos log par lta ba gsum du 'gro ba'i sdig pas de la gzhol te kun la sdug par 'gro ba gnyis
168a4: kyang bgags nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod par bya ba'i phyir zhugs so zhes smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnod pa thams cad dang bral na ci'i phyir de la gnod par 'gyur/ btsun pa bdag gis dug rnon pos zhal
168a5: zas dang / skye mas kyi nang du sbyar gyis/ de dag po la gdod sbyar ro zhes smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag gang 'dod chags kyi dug dang / zhe sdang gi dug dang / gti mug gi dug kyang rab tu skyugs shing bor na dug ngan pa 'di lta bu ci zhig byar yod
168a6: kyis gang sbyar ba de khyer te shog shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du gdan bting ba la bzhugs te/ bzhugs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la dge slong dag la 'di skad du nam rgan rims su
168a7: 'byor tshogs so nas skad ma byung gi bar du su yang zan ma za shig par bsgo shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong dag la tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni rgan rims su 'byor tshogs so zhes skang ma byung gi bar du su yang
168a8: zan ma za shig ces byung ngo / / de nas dge slong gi dge 'dun de dag bde bar 'khod nas/ kha zas dag bsnyen pa dang / 'phrul dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gyis dpal sred kyi khyim du rgan rims su 'byor tshogs shes skad byung ba dang / kha zas dang skom dag

168b1: kyang drag med par gyur to/ / dpal sbed de dogs bzhin du kha zas dang sgom dag 'drim zhing bsams pa/ rgan rims nas gzhon nu dag gi drung du 'ongs pa dang / da tsam dge slong rgan rims dag ni drag rnon pos 'gyel gor ma chag go//
168b2: gzhon nu nas yang rgan rims kyi drung du 'ongs nas yang 'di snyam du sems te/ de'i blo yang de ltar bu skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi dug spangs kyi/ nyan thos thams cad kyi ma yin snyam du bsams
168b3: nas/ de ltar dge slong dag thams cad kyis bshos gsol na cig la yang gnod par ma gyur to// chung dran de'i lhag ma zos pa dag la yang gnod par mgyur to// de nas khyim bdag dpal sbed kyi byir dang ba skyes so// de chung ma dang gnyis kyis
168b4: bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol nas/ lhung bzed byung ste phyag bcabs par shes nas stan dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal sbed dang chung ma'i bsam pa dang /
168b5: bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin dag mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i chos rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad do// khyim bdag dpal sbed kyis de thos nas 'jig tshogs su lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom
168b6: nas rgyun du zhugs par 'bras bu mngon du byas so/ / des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum smras te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phan btags pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma gyis// sdug pa dang / mdza' bo dang /
168b7: gnyen dang / 'khor kyis kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lhas kyang ma bgyis/ snga ma'i yi dgas kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi mchi ma dang / khrag gi rgya mtsho ni bsnams/ rus pa'i
168b8: ri las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo ni bcad/ mtho ris kyi sgo ni bye ste// bdag ni lha dang mi'i gnas su bzhag go zhes smras nas/ yang gsol pa/ nyes pa mngabs rungs pa// ngan du 'gro ba'i lam rnams te// khyod kyi mthus ni de dag bcad/ mtho ris 'gro ba'i sgo phye bsod

169a1: nams can/ / mya ngan 'da' ba'i lam yang bdag gis thob// khyod la brten pas thob pa nyes bral ba'i// bdag gi mig ni dag cing rnam par dag/ 'phags pa dgyes pa'i gnas bzhi thob// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/ skye bo
169a2: lha min lha dang mi yis mchod/ / skye ba na ba rga shi rnam par bral// srid pa stong du'ang rnyed par shin du dga'// thub pa khyod mthong dang ni 'bras bur ldan// btsun pa bdag ni mngon par rgal te mngon par rgal lo// nga ni bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /
169a3: chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis/ deng phan chad nam mtsho'i bar du srog dang bsngos te skyabs su mchinas mngon du dad kyis/ bdag la dge bsnyen du zung shig/ btsun pa deng phan chad mu stegs can gcer bu pa dang / gcer bum
169a4: dang gcer bu ba'i nyan thos rnams la ni sgo bcad/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen pa dang / dge bsnyen ma la ni sgo dbye'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag dang / la sred la chos kyi gtam gyis
169a5: yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par bstabs/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ rab tu dga' bar byas nas gdan las bzhengs de bzhud do// de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung du gdan bting ba la bzhugs/
169a6: so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyim bdag dpal sbed kyi khyim du de lta bu'i gnod pa dag byung ba de la der de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen par ma gyur na gor ma chag par dge slong mang po zhig dug gi
169a7: dus byas par 'gyur/ khyim bdag des ngan du spyad pas 'tshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo // de bas na dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi dge slong la mtshungs par spyod pa'i chos bca'o// dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dge slong gi rgan rims su 'dug nas
169a8: kha zas dag bshams te 'ongs pa dang / sngar chung ngu na lan tshwa tsam yang ma blang shig/ rgan rims su 'byor tshogs shes skad ma phyung bar blangs na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ de'i tshe na khyim bdag gzhan zhig

169b1: gis gtsug lag khang chen po zhig tsag pa la zhugs pa las/ des byed tsam brtsegs pa dang dus 'das so// de'i bu khyim gyi bdag por gyur nas dge slong dag gis de'i gan du song ste bzhin bzangs khyod kyi phas gtsug lag khang rtsig pa la zhugs pa dang / de yang byed
169b2: sas zin pa dang dus 'das so/ / de ni khyod kyis mjug bsgrub pa'i rigs so nas smras pa dang / de dang bachung ste gtsug lag khang de ni che bas na de tsam rtsig sus nus kyis/ de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na ni chen po de bshig la chung ngur babyungs te bgyi'o zhes
169b3: smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' byas pa/ de ste cig mi nus na shig la chung ngu byos shig/ de sa the tshom du ma byed cig/ gleng gzhini mnyan du yod pa na ste/ khyis bdag gzhan zhig
169b4: gis gtsug lag khang chung ngu zhig cig par zhugs pa las/ de yang byed tsam zin pa dang dus 'das so// de'i bu yang khyim gyi bdag por gyur nas/ de la dge slong dag gis de la bzhin bzangs khyod kyis pas gtsug pag khang byed brtsigs nas lus pa de khyod kyis
169b5: mjug sbubs shig ces smras pa dang / de rab tu dad pa zhig 'phags pa dag bdag ni ched bgyid par dad na de ni chung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang na snga ma bshig la chen po zhig bcig go zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan
169b6: 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste nus na chung ngu bshig ste cher brtsig par gnang gis de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ de bzhin du khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis mchod rten chen po zhig brtsig par byas pa la byed tsam zin pa drang
169b7: dedus 'das so/ / de'i bu yang khyim gyi bdag por gyur nas de la dge slong dag gis bzhin bzangs khyod kyi pas mchod rten byed tsam brtsigs shing 'dug na de khyod kyis 'jug sbubs shig ces smras pa dang / de yang ma dad pa zhig ste 'phags pa de tshe ches pas rtsig
169b8: bar mi nus na/ de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na de la bdag gis de slar bshig la chung ngur bgyi'o zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gtsug lag khang ni

170a1: chen po las chung ngur bsgyur du yang rung cher yang rung gi/ mchod rten ni chen po las chung ngur ma bskyur shig/ chung ngur byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis yang mchod rten chung ngu zhig rtsig tu zhugs pa las phyed tsam
170a2: zin pa dang de dus 'das so/ / de'i bu yang khyim gyi bdag por gyur nas dge slong dag gis de la bzhin bzangs khyod kyi phas mchod rten rtsig tu zhugs pa las phyed tsam zin pa dang des dus las 'das na/ de khyod kyis mjug sbubs shig ces smras pa dang / de yang rab
170a3: cadad ba zhig ste/ bdag ni cher dad pa lags kyis/ de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis cher bskyed par bgyi'o zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste chud
170a4: drab shig ste chen por byed nus na gnang gis byos shig/ de la the tshom dum byed cig/ mchod rten dang gdugs rnyings shing zhig pa yang de bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos shig ces bka' stsal ba dang / gzhan zhig gos gdugs pab nas slar ma bsgrubs kyi
170a5: bar du dus 'das pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rjes ma ma zin gyi bar du snga ma dbab par ma byed cig/ de bzhin du sku gzugs 'jim pa la byas pa dag rnyings nas/ dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas ma byas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
170a6: de dang 'dra ba 'am/ de las lhag par ni byos shig/ chung ngu ni ma yin no// de bzhin du ri mo'i bris pa dag kyang ri mo byid pa dang / dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas ri mor ma bris nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bying na de nyid kyi rgyud slar bris shig/ de bzhin du
170a7: sangs rgyas kyi bka'i glegs bam dag bying bar gyur nas/ dge slong dag gis the tshom skyes nas ma bris pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byid na sangs rgyas kyis bka' slar bris shig/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ rkyang ba'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i
170a8: tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o/ / // dul ba bzhud dam pa/ bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa/ mdor na/ gsar bus 'jug par bya ba dang / 'khor rnams rnam pa lnga yis dang / yon dang sdod dang rol mo dang / dge bsnyen dag ni bsgrags pa'o//

170b1: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzam bu'i gling dman bzhugs pa'i sku gzugs la rus kyi mchod rten chen po dang bcas par byos la/ grong khyer gyi nang du bkur bar gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis
170b2: sus bkur bar mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gzhon nu dag gis khyer cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gzhon nu dag gis khyer cig par bka' stsal pa dang / de 'khor med par gyur pas na mi mdzes nas/ bcom ldan
170b3: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma'i 'khor lnga dang chos shig/ dad pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag gis yon phul na sus kyang ma blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
170b4: slong dag gis blang bar byos shig/ gzhon nus blang ngam rgan po rnams kyis blang ba de dag gis ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgan po rnams kyis long shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong de dag gis bkur bar
170b5: byos shig dang / dge slong gnas brtan dag gis khyer te dal bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gnas brtan dag gis srungs la gzhan gyis bkur bar gyis shig/ dge slong dag gis rol mo med par dong ba dang / khyim bdag
170b6: mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na ni sku gzugs gshegs pa'i tshe bdag gis rol mo sbyar ro zhes smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag de ltar na gnad gyis sbyor cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe
170b7: dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong rol mo bgyir rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo // nam mchod pa'i dus ni 'di skad du gzhin bzangs ston pa la mchod par byos shig ces bsgo shig/ rkyang ba'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa'o//
170b8: mdor na/ sgrogs par byed dang snod sbed dang // shing rta tha dad byed pa dang // snod rnams bged pa rung ba dang // mdo'i tshigs su bcad par brjod pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na 'dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs

171a1: so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis dus ston chen po gyis la shing 'dzam bu'i grib man bzhugs pa'i sku gzugs grong khyer du gshegs par rgyas par byos shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag dag la ma sman par
171a2: dongango / / de dag gis e ma'o 'phags pa dag red cag la sngar sman na ni nged kyis yon rnams sta gon bya bzhig ces spras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong gis dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhag bdun
171a3: nam brgyad kyi snga rol nas dus kyi mchod ston chen po byed do zhes grong khyer dang / tshong dus dang / srang dang / lam dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dag tu bsgrag par byos shig/ de dag gis dus ston no duso ston no zhes bsgrags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
171a4: zhag dus thob la zhag 'di snyed cig na dus ston byed do zhes sbron cig/ de ltar byas kyang 'jig rten thams cad kyis ma thos nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gro ga la bris la bal glang gi steng du zhog ste/ tshong dus dang / srang dang / lam dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dag
171a5: tu bklags par gyis shig/ gang gi nyin mo bcom ldan 'das kyis dus ston chen po byed pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gnas brtan dang / gnas brtan dag gis ni yon rnams srungs shig/ gzhon nu rnams kyis ni byer cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / des byer
171a6: bababab tu bor ba dang / mabyin par len pa dag gis brkus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snod spyad sred pa'i dge slong smos shig/ bsko ba ni 'di ltar bsko'o// stan bting lag Na DI brdungs shing dris pal lan glon pa'i dge slong bskos te/ dge slong
171a7: gis dge 'dun rnams tshogs shing 'khod pa dang / sngar ni dad par byos shig/ khyod ming 'di zhes bya ba dge 'dun gyi snod sbed par bskon dang dam zhes dris te/ dad ni des kyang dang do// zhes smros shig/ de'i 'og tu dge slong cig gis gsol ba dang las byos shig/ gson cig
171a8: btsun pa'i dge 'dun rnams/ ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod sbed par dad na/ de ste de dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnod shig dang ming 'di zhes bgyi ba snod sbed par bskos te/ snod sred pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi snod sbed

171b1: de/ 'di ni gsol pa'o// las kyang 'di ltar bya ste/ gson cig btsun pa'i dge 'dun rnams/ ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod sprod par dad de/ de dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di snod sbed par bsgo ste/ ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi sdong
171b2: sbed na tshe dang ldan pa'i rnams las gang la ming 'di zhes bgyi ba snod sbed du bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/ gang la mi bzod pa dag ni spros shig/ dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di snod sbed par bsko ste/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang
171b3: bas na ci mi gsung ste/ de de bzhin du 'dzin to// der yang rnyed pa dag mang du byung nas dge slong ma dag gis 'phags pa dag bdag cag la rnyed pa'i skal ba stsol cig ces smras kyang dge slong dag gis ma byin no// de dag gis phyi de nyin mo shing rta gzhan zhig pagams
171b4: pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis 'phags ma dag shing rta 'di nyid dam 'on te gzhan zhig ces dris nas/ dge slong ma de dag gis kyang rnyed pa mang du 'gyur to// dge slong ma dag gis rnyed pa dang bkur bsti la dom par gyur pa dge slong dag gis mthong
171b5: nas 'phags pa khyed kyis kho mo cag la rnyed pa ma byin mod kyi/ bdag cag gis kyang shing rta logs shig tu bshams pas bdag cag la yang rnyed pa mang du thob par gyur te zhos smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
171b6: nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ dge slong dag gang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur pa ni dge slong mdag gis rus ston gyi shing rta gud ru bshams pas de bas na dge slong dang dge slong ma dag gis shing rta logs shig tu mi bsham par dgongs nas/ bcom ldan
171b7: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong mas ni mi rigs par byas te/ de bas na dge slong mas dus ston gyi tshe shing rta logs shig tu ma shom shig/ dge slong ma dag gis dus ston gyi tshe shing rta logs shig tu bshams na dbyen byas pa dang / nye ba'i nyes pa
171b8: sbom por 'gyur ro/ / snod de dag de bzhin du 'dug pa dang dge slong dag gis ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bgos shig ces gsungs pa dang / de dag ji ltar bgo ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snod bged pa'i dge slong

172a1: cig sgo shig/ bsgo ba ni 'di ltar bya'o// stan thing b+he ga Na DI rdungs la dris pa la lan glen pa'i dge slong skos la dge 'dun thams cad 'dus te 'khor ba dang sngar dad par byos shig/ khyod dge 'dun gyi snod bged par skon dang dam zhes dris la/
172a2: de ste dang ro zhes zer na de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba dang las byos shig/ gson cig btsun pa'i dge slong rnams/ snod bged pa mid 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod bged par dad na/ deste/ ge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis
172a3: gnod la dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhas bgyi ba 'di snod bged par skos shig/ ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi snod bged de 'din gsol ba'o// las kyang 'di ltar byos shig/ gson cig btsun pa'i dge 'dun rnams ming 'di zhes bgyi ba snod bged par rad na
172a4: dge 'dun gyi snod bged de/ dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi snod bged par tshe dang ldan pa rnams gang bzod pa ni cang ma gsungs shig/ mi bzod pa ni smros shig/ dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di snod bged par skos te/ dge 'dun gyis
172a5: bzod cing gnang na cang mi gsang ste de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ / rkyang ba'i sgo gnyis kyis mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o// // med par ma ste/ rnam pa tha dad byas dang yon/ gang gi tshe na gcig las lhag/ gang gi tshe na gnyis las gcig/ bdag gir
172a6: bya bar mi rung ngo / / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i mdze ti 'tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// gang gi tshe dus ston chen po byung ba na rnyed pa mang ba dang ldan par gyur nas/ dge slong dag gis ji ltar bya ba'i thabs mi
172a7: shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gos sbed ba'i dge slong gis stan thaMd la gaN DI brdungs dri te dris pa la lan glon pa'i dge slong skos la dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing 'khod pa'i nang du btsong par bya'o// de dag gis sus
172a8: rin thad gdab par ma shes mas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis thob shig/ de dag gis de nyid nyor bcug pa dang / de nyid la nyor ma gzhug shig/ dge 'dun gyis gnas brtan gyis rin cher btab ste/

172b1: sus kyang ma nyos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ cher ma gdab shig ces gsungs pa dang / shin tu chung ngu btab bo// shin tu chung ngu yang ma gdab par rin par thob shig/ gang gis thog mar rin thang ba skrad pa de nyid nyod chug ces
172b2: smras pa dang de la ma bcod par gang gi tshe rin thang sus kyang ma bskyed na sdod de nyid la chongs shig/ drug sde dag gis rin cher btab ste rin cher bslangs na dge 'dun gyi don gyi pir nged kyis rin thang bskyer do nas smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
172b3: stsal pa/ gad nyo ba des rin thang skyed cig/ gzhan gyis rin thad bskyed na 'das pa dang / bcas par 'gyur ro// drug sde dag gis rin thang bskyed de nyos nas bgus shing bgos so// rin len pa la de nyid slar byin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rin
172b4: ma 'ongs kyi bar du de la ma sbyin cig/ rin ma byin par bgos na 'das pa dang btsas par 'gyur ro// rkyang ba'i sgo gnyis kyi mdo'i tshogs su bcad pa bdun pa'o/ mdor na/ gtsug lag khang ni zhig pa dang / lci ba'i phyir ni dben par bya// nam zhig
172b5: 'jigs par gyur pa na/ skad cig brla ba dge 'dun gyi// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'ja ti 'tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gnas khang lnga rtseg tu byos shig/ dri gcang khang ni bdun
172b6: rtseg sgo yang yang bdun cig tu byos shig ces bka' stsal to/ / dge slong ma'i gnas khang ni sum rtseg go// dri gtsang khong ni lnga rtseg go// sgo khang yang lnga rtseg go// steng gi lcid kyis rtsig pa 'jig tu byed de/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan
172b7: 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ steng ma'i rim cag gri shig/ bon kyang 'jig par gyur pa dang com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ de bzhin du ram gnyes nas bzhi'i bar du zil 'og khang gcig pu zhog shig/ gleng gnan
172b8: mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong rnams la 'jigs pa dag byung nas/ gtsug lag lang stong par byas te/ dge 'dun gyis mal stan yang bor nas bros te dong ba dang / ma byin par len pa dag gis brkus so// brkus pas dge slong dag phongs par gyur to// de ltar zur

173a1: pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi mal stan bor te ma 'dod shig/ gang du ngong ba der khyer cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang du 'dod par khyer cig ces bka'
173a2: sbal pa dang / dge slong zhig gis bgo ba dag khyer te dge slong dag dang lhan cig tu bros te dor ba dang / den nub mo dge slong zhig gis tshe dang ldan pa 'di ni dge 'dun gyi nang nang nin te Ni// rgan rims su dbang de zhes smras pa dang de byin no// des de byin nas ji tsam nam
173a3: nangs pa dang / des bsgo ba 'dis khyer cig ces smras pa dang / des smras pa gang gi tshe bsgo bar bgos pa de'i tshe na ni khyod rgan pos nye ral dag bkur ba'i tshe ni nga la sbyin nam khyod nyid khyer cig/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
173a4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gis 'jigs pa'i tshe khyer khyer ba de nyid kyi'o// gang gi tshe 'jigs pa med par gyur na yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ngo zhes slar ma phul ba dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang //
173a5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag re shig ngas dge 'dun gyi mal stan dag gnang gi gtan du ni ma yin gyi/ 'jigs pa dang bral na slar bral la rgan rims su byin cig/ rgyang ba'i sgo gnyis kyi mda'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o// mdo na//
173a6: 'jo ti tshal du mchod ston no// chen gyis ni 'dra bar bya// thal ni tshol bar 'bod pa dang // dge slong las ni zhas/ ra ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'arde ka'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs te/ khyim bdag mgon med sa sbyin/
173a7: bas bcom ldan 'das la de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis dus ton chen po bgyi'o zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdagangs gnang gis byos shig/ de 'dze ta'i tshal du dus ston byas pa dang / dge slong dag/
173a8: ma 'dus par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mchod ston chen po byed na gaN DI dang / rnga dang / dung bus shig dang / dge slong dag gdugs tshod la bab par dus rig par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag rnga dang rung dag gi sgras brdegs na tshel bar 'a'od

173b1: do/ / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong las zhal ta ba bskos te ci nas rgan rims su 'khor cig/ ji ltar rgan rims su 'khod pa dang / nam zas dag rgan rims nas brims
173b2: te/ gzhon nu'i gan du phyin tsam na gdugs tshod kyang yol te/ dge slong dag zas kyi bar chad du gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lnga brgya phreng du kyis la kha zas ni rgan rims kyi
173b3: mdun du zhog shig/ dge slong dag gis de bzhin du byas pa dang khyim pa dag ni bza' ba 'drim pa la chu'o// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'drim pa'i sbyin pa dge slong skos shig/ de dag kyang kha
173b4: zas kyi bar chad du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag sngar zan byin la phyis zhal ta byed du chug shig/ rkyang ba'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa'o// // mdor na/ dge slong ma ni mang du gyur// dge slong dang po yi rang dang // /
173b5: gcig dang gnyis dang mang po dang // bu chung rab tu dgar gyur pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'i ra ba na bzhugs te/ ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig na/ khyim bdag zhig gnas pa des dge slong ma mang zhig bshos la/
173b6: spyan drangs nas ji tsam zhig na dge slong gcig cig 'dron pa mang po dang lhan cig tu ljongs rgyu ba spyod cing ri brags kyi grong dar phyin pa dang / de der bsod snyoms la zhugs na de na gzhan zhig gis de la 'phags pa khyim 'di na dge slong ma dag bshos gsol
173b7: zhing 'khod kyis der bzhud cig ces smras pa dang / de yang der song nas dge 'dun ma'i gnas brtan sbom mo dga' ldan 'dug ste/ des 'phags pa de ste sbyin pa'i yon tan brjod nus na ni rgan rims su bzhugs shig/ de ste mi nus na phyogs gcig tu bshos
173b8: mnobs la bzhud cig ces smras pa dang / de sbyangs nas des bsams pa de ste bdag gis sbyin pa'i yon tan brjod kyi bar du 'dug na ni 'dron pa mang po dag kyang dong bar 'gyur gyis phyogs gcig tu zan zos te 'gro'o snyam nas phyogs gcig tu zan zos te song

174a1: go rims bzhin du mnyan du yod par byed pa dang / dge slong dag gis tshe dang ldan pa bde bar 'ongs sam/ ci bde bar spyad das zhes smras pa dang / des zlus pa/ gang zhig bde bar phyug/ dge slong mas tal ka byas so// da ji ltar byas shes sbas
174a2: dang / de ltar gyur ba rgyas par dge slong dgal smras so// dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dag / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gdan dge slong gcig dang dge slong ma gcig gnas pa de ni dge slong de zal kya dang // su yang
174a3: zan yang dang por zo shig/ ga na dge slong ma gnyis sam gsum ma ma de las lhag pa zhig la dge slong gcig cig 'ongs na dge slong gcig pu de stan yang dang po/ chu yang dang po zan yang dang por zo shig/ gang de ste dge slong ma dag 'bab shig na yang rtag
174a4: tu gral gi dang por stan cig lhag par zhog la 'khod cig de ste dge tshul pha zhig 'ongs na yang de der 'dug la zo shig/ de ste des mi nus par gyur na yang dge slong mas sbyin pa'i yon tan lhogs shig/ dge slong mas de ltar ma byas na 'das pa dang bcas
174a5: par 'gyur ro/ / gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin pas 'dze ta'i tshal du dus ston chen po byas nas bu dang chung ma dge 'dun la yon du phul ba dang / dge slong dag gis ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcos
174a6: ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag la dris shig/ dris pa dang / bdes smras pa/ 'phags pa dag thang chod cig dang bdag gis glud gsol lo// drug sde dag gis de la 'gran cing spel ba la zhugs pa dang / de'i nang nas
174a7: chung ma bu chung ngu can gyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi rkang pa la bdud de jo bo bdag gi bu chung gis bdag ma gtang shig ces smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
174a8: dge slong dag sems can gyi nang na bud med pas snying chung ba med kyis 'jigs par ma bya shig/ de bas dge slong gis bud med kyi rin thangs gcod cig/ bcad na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// sbyin bdag gis ji ltar dga' zhing dga' ste byin bzhin du

174b1: longs shig/ rkyang ba'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa/ rdzogs s+ho// // mdor bsdus par na/ yo byad bus pa blun pa dang // gang gi pa dang de yi ste// de ltar khye'u las bslad mi bya// mgon pad zlas sbyin de bzhin te// sugri dang ni 'khor rngam pa
174b2: dang / su dang bsdus par gsungs pa'o// sador na/ yo byad rnams dang gnang ba dang // u pA las ni dris pa ste// ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bya// yid gtsugs tshigs bcad mdor gsungs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pan 'dze ti
174b3: tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'/ ra ba na bzhugs te/ dge slong dag ljo ngas rgyu ba spyod pa na/ na par gyur te/ kha cig la sman med nas lhung bzed btsongs kyang khyim bdag gis ma nyos nas dus 'das par gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis
174b4: bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis yod byad dang gos chongs shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yo byad dang gos tshongs shig ces gsungs pa dang / dge slong dag gis bkrus nas kha bsgyur te btsongs pa dang /
174b5: rani chung ngur gyur te// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma bkrus kha ma bsgyur/ sar pa btags ma thag chongs shig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhu nas pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis yo byad bcu gsum
174b6: longs shig ces bka' stsal pa na ji ltar byin gyis bslab par bgyi/ u pA li so sor byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ chos gos 'di ni sbyar mar byin gyis brla ba ste/ bya ba zin pa yongs su spyad pa'o// de bzhin du stong g.yogs dang mthar gos dang / sham thabs
174b7: dang sham thabs kyi 'theb dang / stong chags dang / stod chags kyi 'theb dang / gdong gyis dang / lus rtsi ba dang / g.yan pa'i gos dang / sgra bzed dang / g.yogs ma dang / ras chen te gos 'di ni yo byad kyi gos su byin gyis pa rlabs te/ rda bal dgos te bdag dang
174b8: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa'i phyir byin gyis brlab bo/ / yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yo byad bcu gsum byin gyis rlobs shig ces bka' stsal pa na/ de las lhag pa'i gos rnams

175a1: ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ u pA li de ni slob dpon dang / mkhan po dang / yid gtsugs pa rnams la bsngos la bcad par bya ste/ de yang 'di ltar bsngo bar bya'o// dge slong gcig gi mdun du 'dug la 'di skad spros shig/
175a2: dgongs shig tshe dang ldan pa bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gos 'di lhag par bsdu ste/ bsngo ba'i rigs pas na mkhan pa la bsngo ste/ mkhan po yid gzugs pas bcad par babya'o// de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o// byung ba'i ni na
175a3: gsum pa'i mda'i tshigs su bcad pa dang pa'o/ / / 'dor na/ lus bathun la stsogs shes pa// bcu gnyis kyin gang zag dang / de bzhin rnam par dbye ba dang // tshul bzhi pa ni gsum pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yad pan la
175a4: ti 'tshal mgon med pa zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa ud pA lis zhus pa/ btsun pa gang zag du slar bzlog pa me brdzun/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ u pA li bcu gnyis te/ du
175a5: ba dang / blun po dang / mi gsal ba dang / mi mkhas pa dang / ngo tsha med pa dang / len du 'dzin pa dang / 'tshams kyi phyi rol na 'dug pa dang / spangs pa dang / tshig mi brtan pa dang / spyod lam las gal ba dang / tshul bzhin du mi gnas pa dang / bslab pabyin pa/
175a6: yang gus pa btsun pa rde tsam gyis na byas pa lta bu nas ji tsam gyis na bslab pa stsal ba'i bar du lags/ u pA li gang log par bsam pa sems pa dang / log par smra ba log par smra ba dang / bzlog dka' bar 'azlog pa yin te/ u pA li de ltar na gyis
175a7: bar 'gyur ro/ / btsun pa ji tsas na ldan pa lags/ mdo sde mi mdzin pa/ 'dul ba mi 'dzin pa/ mak+ta bu mi 'dzin pa ste/ 'di tsam gyis na u pA li glen pa yin no// btsun pa ji tsam gyi san mi gsal ba lags u pA li gang mdo sde yang 'dzin/ 'a
175a8: bayang 'dzin/ ma lta bu yang 'dzin mod kyi/ 'on kyang mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / chos mngon du bya ba'i don me shes pa b+ha/ 'di tsam gyisan u pA li mi gsal ba yin no// btsun pa ji tsam gyis ni mi mkhas pa lags/ u pA li gang mdo sde dang / 'dul

175b1: pa dang / ma lta bu yang 'dzin/ de dag gi don kyang shes mod kyis/ gzhan shes par byed mi nus pa ni u pA li mi mkhas pa ste/ 'di tsam gyis na u pA li mi mkhas pa yin no// btsun pa ji tsam gyis na ngo tsha med pa lags/ u pA li de ni bas pam
175b2: pa bzhi las gang yang rung nyes bzung bar gyur pa ste/ u pA li na ma med par gyur pa'o// btsun pa rji tsam gyis na khon du 'dzin pa lags/ u pA li khro ba dang / thab mo dang / gzhan yang gang dang gang du 'thab pa'i sgor blang ba / sun la
175b3: 'khon du 'dzin pa'o/ / btsun pa rje tsam gyis na 'tshams kyi skad rol na mchis pa lags/ da ni u pA'i dge slong gi 'tshams kyi phyi rol na 'dug pa ste/ A pA li de tsam gyis na 'tshams kyi ro lan 'dug pa'o// btsun pa ji tsam gyis na spangs pa lags/
175b4: pA'i de ni dge 'dun gyis gsal pa dang bzhi'i las kyis spangs pa ste/ u pA li de tsas rdzas na sbyangs par 'gyur bzhes bya'o// bdun padzi tsam kyis tshig mi brten par byur pa lags/ A pA'i de ni tshig sa brgyan par gyur pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / za bas/
175b5: tshig tshul po dang / chegatul bar smra ba'o// A pA li tsam gyis ni tshig mi brtan par gyung ba// tsun pa di tsas kyis na spyod las las gal par gyur pa lags/ u pa 'di ni dge dun byin nas 'das te song bal// mu d+ha lid ltar byid lam las ga
175b6: byung ba'o/ btsun pa dzin ma gyis na tshul bzhin lami gnas par gyur ba zhes bgyi/ u pA li ni mi spyod pa ni spyod dge slong gis bslab pa la'i slob pa'o// An li di tsam gyis na tshul bzhin la mi gnas par byur ba zhes bya'o// btsun ji tsam gyis na bslab pa sa
175b7: bar gyur ba zhes bgyi/ / u pA li de ni dge slong la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis nam 'tsho'i ba dang bslab pa byin par gyur pa ste/ u pA li de lta bu ni bslab pa byin par gyur pa'o// yang gsol pa/ btsun pa ji tsam gyisan/ gang zag gis sar
175b8: bzlog pa la brgyan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ u pA li rnam pa gsum ste/ tshul bzhin la gnas pa dang / tshig brtan pa dang / spyod lam las ma gal ba'o// rgyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'o// /

176a1: mdor na/ gang gi phyir ni bya ba dang // gang zag kyang ni bcu gnyis ni// bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa dang // khyim pa yin par khas blangs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dze ti'i chal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na 'azhugs so//
176a2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang la las bya ba de'i thar bzlog pa mi brgyan no zhes bka' stsal na/ btsun pa gang zag bcu gnyis so sor bsgo ba'i tshe de dag 'di skad du mchi ste/ tshe dang ldan pa
176a3: dag bdag cag la ni ma sa/ shig ces mchin ci de dag gis slar bzlog pa yang mi brgyan nam/ u pA li bcan no// de'i chad pa'i las langs dgongs te/ gsungs so// btsun pa bstan par rdzogs par bgyid pa khyim pa ga las yang sa ga rdzog sa sa rnye pa ga
176a4: zhes bgyi/ u pA li bsnyen par rdzogs par zin kyang khyim pa yin par khas blangs na/ de yang bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes bya na bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe lha smos kyang ci dgos/ rkyang ba'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'o// mdor na/
176a5: tshil bu dag ni mi rung ba// lnga po gang gis rkang mi bsku// dbang phyug bsgrags par bya ba dang // zhing gis dngos po dge 'dun bgyi'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dze ti 'tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi rung ba rnam
176a6: pa lnga'i lham ma 'chang shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde dag gis mi rung ba nam pa rnam pa lnga po de dag gis tshil bus rkang pa byugs nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bal glang gi drung du dong ste/ rdzi phyogs su 'khod pa dang / bal glang dag gis dring tsher nas zos
176a7: pa dang / de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag zung shig ces smras pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag gis bzung bar mi nus so// bzhin bzangs nged kyis gzung ngam/ 'phags pa dag zung shig nged la cing sbyin/ bca' ba'i rin sbyin no// des de dag gi mdun du song ste
176a8: rje mi ldang ba'i phyogs su 'dug pa dang / bal glang de dag gis kyang 'khod do// de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci khyed rig pa mkhyen nam/ bzhin bzangs ded rig pa mi shes mod kyi/ nged kyi bal glang cang shes kyi tshil bus rkang pa bskus pas so//

176b1: 'phags pa dag rgyal po'i bal glang mchog dag zos par gyur nas/ khyod kyis rgyal po la gnod pa byas par mi 'gyur ram zhes smras nas de dag nyes pa dor brjod cing 'phyas 'dogs te mi snyan par zer ro// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
176b2: gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis bal glang cang shes kyi tshol gyis rkang pa byug par ma byed cig/ dge slong gis bal glang cang shes kyi tshil gyis nang pa labyugs na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// ji ltar ba la grang
176b3: cang shes pa bzhin du rta cang shes dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / gzigs la sogs pa rgyas par brjod par bya'o// gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na ste/ de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po tshe dang ldan pa kun bdaga' bo gang na ba der song ste drung du byin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun
176b4: dga' bo'i rkang pal mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// phags pa'i kun dga' bo mang ge'i gdan bshams pa 'dis
176b5: zhig bgyi ci deng chos bsgrags sam/ de'i tshig giso sbyin gyi dus la bab ste/ de rgyal po chen po dge slong gis mtshungs par bzung ba lags kyi khyim pas mtshungs par bzung ba ma lags so zhes smras pa dang / rgyal pos rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te songango // mkhyen bzhin//
176b6: du 'dri ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan na ku dang / yol ci'i phyir rgyal ba chos papa par song zhes smras pa dang / da ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la nib mong gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal gsun
176b7: dga' bo khyod kyis nyes so/ / deste rgyal po gzugs can snying po sa sor bar yo la srung // nges par do sngon pas kyang mngon du dga' bar 'gyur te/ dga' das dga' ba'i dbang gis bya ba byed du gdon mi za'o// de bas na ngas gnang gis 'di 'dra ba'i skyes bu ma
176b8: padang pa de dag la ni thos par gyis shig/ gzhan yang rab tu phyug lam dang / dbul la rab tu dang de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bu dag la'ang thos par gyis shig/ gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa gro zhin bye ba nyi shu pa zhes bya ba skya bo bsed bser

177a1: po skam zhing ring la rgya zhing lus nyam chung bar gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo ci'i phyir na gro zhin bye ba nyi shu pa zhes bya ba skya bo bsed bser po skem zhing ring la
177a2: rgya zhing nyam chud par gyur/ des bcom ldan 'das de dang po btsas nas thug pa 'ba' zhig gis lus bskyed pa lags so zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ltar bas na ngas gnang gis gro zhin bye ba nyi shu pa la thug pa
177a3: lung cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gro zhen bye ba nyi shu pa la tshe dang ldan pa gro zhin bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod ni thug pa 'thung shig par gnang ngo zhes bsgo ba dang / des smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo bdag gcig bu la 'am/ de ste dge 'dun thams cad/ des
177a4: smras pa/ khyod gcig pu'o// btsun pa kun dga' bo 'dis glengs pas na tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag gis kyang 'di skad du gro zhin bye ba nyi shu pa bstan pa la rab tu byung nas sngon grong khyer tsam pa na lo legs par gyur pa'i tshe/ bal glang bdun gyis drang ba yang
177a5: spangs te rab tu byung na deng thug pa tsam la yang chags so zhes zer gyis/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi phyir dge 'dun thams cad kyang thug pa gnang na bdag kyang bzod 'tshal bar bgyi'o zhes gsol ba dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan
177a6: 'das la gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar na gnang gis gro zhin bye ba nyi shu pa'i phyir dge 'dun thams cad kyang thug pa 'thung shig/ gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun rnams thug pa 'thung bar
177a7: gnang ngo zhes thos nas de sa dge 'dun la sa bon bum pa stong gis btab pa'i zhing dag phul ba dang / dge slong dag gis ma blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi phyir na blang bar bya ste de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ de bas na zhing las
177a8: byung ba rnams dge 'dun gyis spyad par gyis shig/ rkyang ba'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o// mdor na/ gding dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / dge tshul tha dang gsar bu dang // snyoms zhugs dang ni mi gnang ba// bslab pa byin pa

177b1: gnyis pa'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na 'dze ti'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong dang khyim pa gnyis lhan cig
177b2: rtsa gding ba gcig la mchis su rung ngam/ u pA li de ni mi rung mod kyi/ de ltar bu'i rkyen cig byung na gnang ngo // btsun pa dge tshul pha dang / dge slong gsar bu dang / ma ning dang / za ma dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / pha bsad pa dang / ma bsad pa dang dgra
177b3: bcom pa bsad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang / mu stegs can dang / mu stegs can du song ba dang rkun gnas dang so sor gnas pa dang / mi gnas pa dag la sogs pa dang gding ba gcig gi steng na lhan cig tu mchis
177b4: bar rung ngam/ u pA li de ltar ni mi rung mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen cig byung nagan de bzhin du stan gcig gam/ khri gcig gam/ khri'u gcig gam/ bar tang gcig tu mi rung mod kyi/ de ltar bu'i rkyen cig byung na rung ngo // btsun pa khyim pa dang stegs bu la stan bting
177b5: ba'i steng na lhan cig tu mchis par rung ngam/ mi rung mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen cig byung na rung ngo // bar tang dag bting yang rung mod kyi de ltar ba'i rkyen cig byang na bar tang dag bting bar gyur pa'ang de bzhin no// de bzhin du dge tshul pha dang / dge slong gsar bu nas so
177b6: sor gnas pa'i bar du ste/ de bzhin du gnas la nyes pa'i dmigs ma byung gi bar du lhan cig tu 'dug na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bslab bstsal ba gnyis shig stan gcig gi steng na lhan cig mchis su rung ngam/ u pA li de ni mi rung
177b7: do rkyang ba'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshogs su bcad pa lnga pa'o/ / / 'dul ba gzhung dam pa/ bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// mdor na/ mi bslang ba dang khri'u gcig/ brel bar gyur pa'ang de bzhin te// cung zad brel bar gyur pa dang // rtswa dang shing
177b8: yang dge 'dun gyi'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod du ba'i 'dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'i ra ba na bzhugs pa'i tshe/ dge slong dag khri'u yi steng na btso blag gi las byed cig 'dug pa dang / drug sde dag de nyid du 'dug cing

178a1: gnod par byed de/ de dag brel bzhin du bslad pa dang de dag la gnod par gyur nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong bco
178a2: p+lag gi las byed cing bral ba la dge slong dag gis ma bslar shig/ bslad na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong dag zas za shing 'khod pa rnams la drug sde dag gis nan rims bzhin du bya'o zhes bslad
178a3: pa dang / dge slong dag ldang du ma btub nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar rgan rims bzhin du 'dug shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar rgan rims bzhin du 'dug shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde dag phyis 'ongs nas dge
178a4: slong snga ma zas za zhing brel ba dag bslad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis dge slong zas za zhing brel ba dag ma bslang par gung du 'dug par bya ste/ bslad na 'das pa dang bcas pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
178a5: latshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/ btsun pa ji tsam gyis na dge slong dag zan za zhing brel ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chung ngu lan tshwa'am/ shad tshe 'am/ la bug kyang rung brims par gyur pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
178a6: dge slong zas za zhing brel ba lam bslad shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde dag rgan rims kyis dang por 'dug nas zas za zhing ched du brel bar byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis gral ma yin par 'dug la zas za zhi brel bar
178a7: ma byed cig/ byas na bya 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag gral rims la mkhas par gyis shig/ de las gzhan du na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun gyi btso brag gi bum pa dang / gzhong khung dag dge slong gis blangs nas btso blag gi las
178a8: byed pa dang / drug sde dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag deng rgan pas nged sngar dbang ngo zhes smras nas/ tshon rtsi dag po ste khyer ba dang dge slong dag brel bar gyur nas/ de lta gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis

178b1: bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis bum pa'am/ gzhong khung dag brel ba la mthang bar bya ba rnams zin nas sdod long shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis bum pa 'am/ gzhod lung dag brel ba la ma bslar shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / drug
178b2: sdedag gis bsams bzhin du sgod rnams tshon nung zad tsam zhig gis brel bar byas te/ bzhag pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshon rtsi thams cad snod gcig gi nang du thugs la dgos na blang bar gyis shig/ dge slong gis snod dag gi nang du na
178b3: rtsi cung zad kyis brel bar bya ste/ ma gzhag shig/ bzhag na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'dze ta'i tshal shing thags kyis bskor ba dang khyim bdag dag gis pag cing bcag cing
178b4: khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma bkur cig ces bsgo shig/ de dag gis bsgo ba dang / shing dang rtswa yang bor te dong ngo de dag nus zos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spyad du mi rung ba dag na tshad mang du skyol cig/
178b5: lhag ma dag ni las gsar du byed pa la phul cig/ drug sde dag gis las gsar du byang rung ba'i shing dag gshegs nas mer bus te btso blag gi las byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ las gsar du byar rung ba'i shing dag ni mabud cig/ pus na
178b6: bdas pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ / rgyang ba'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o// mdor na/ mgon med zas sbyin gyi rgyan// 'dug pa blang bar mi byo// snod spyad lagan thogs pa dang // lham yang phyi bar bya ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
178b7: 'das mnyan du yod pa'i 'dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste gnang na bdag gis 'dze ta'i tshal yang dbul bar bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang / bcom
178b8: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag ngas gnang gis phul cig/ des shing gang po'i ming du bya ba la ni pho'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ gad mo'i ming du bya ba la ni mo'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / dge slong dag gis ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong

179a1: dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag nyid la dris shig/ de dag gis khyim bdag nyid la dris pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa ji ltar bsngos pa de bzhin du mdzod cig/ de ltar gyur pa dge
179a2: slong dag gise bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang shing pho'i ming du bya ba dang / gang shing mo'i ming du bya ba rnams kyi rgyan so sor bsdus la thum por byos te zhog shig/ nam dus ston gyis tshe yang de bzhin du brgyan par
179a3: gyis shig/ rtsig pa'i ni ri mo'i yo byad du byos shig/ bsro khang gi rtsig pa dang / ka ba dag gi ni las gsar du byos shig/ de'i sa'i ni dge 'dun gyi snang mar byos shig/ nad pa'i sman khang gi rtsig pa dang / ka ba'i de dag ni las gsar du byos shig/ de'i sa'i sngar
179a4: gyi yo byad byos shig/ tshad mang gi rtsig pa dang ka ba'i ni de dag las gsar du byos shig/ de'i sa'i ni dge 'dun gyi bshos su gyis shig/ chu gang gi rtsig pa dang / ka ba'i las gsar du gyis shig/ de'i sa'i ni skom du rims shig/ dugs khang gi rtsigs
179a5: ba dang / ka ba'i ni de'i las gsar du gyis shig/ de'i sa'i ri dugs khang du gyis shig/ bkad sa'i khang pa'i rtsig pa dang / ka ba dag gis ni las gsang du gyis shig/ de'i sa'i ni snum pa'i zor gyis shig/ khyams dang / stegs bu dang / 'chags dang / sgo
179a6: dang / yang thog gi rtsig pa dang / ka bdag gis ni las gsar du gyis shig/ de'i sa'i ni dge 'dun spyir gos shig/ gang rdzing bu'i bde ni phyogs bzhi'o dge/ slong gi dge 'dun gyi spyir zhog shig/ dge slong spong ba'i khang bu'i nang na 'dug
179a7: dag pa'i phyogs spyod pa dang / drug sde dag der 'ongs nas ded rgan no zhes zer nas de dag bslang ste btong ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgan rims so zhes dge slong gis dge slong 'khod pa la ma bslang shig/ bslang na 'das pa
179a8: dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ / dge slong dag bya ba byas nas stan lam langs te 'chag cing 'dug bzhin du gzhan gyis stan blangs nas ma stong nas dge slong dag brel bar gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /

179b1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bya ba byas nas stan las langs na stan ma 'dzin cig/ dge slong dag ring zhig tu stan las 'dug nas langs te 'chag pa dang / de'i sar drug sde dag 'dug nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom
179b2: ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ der ma 'dug shig/ langs de 'chag tu 'gron yang de'i steng du chos gos sam// bus 'khyur cig zhog la tshogs shig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong dag stod rnams/
179b3: thogs bzhin du gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang / de nas dge slong gcig gis thogs bzhin du phyag byas pa dang / de'i ril ba phyag par gyur to// gzhan zhig kyang khang bzangs kyi ka ba la lham brdabs pa dang / dge slong dag 'phyar bar gyur nas
179b4: ltar gyur la dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas dge slong lam du 'jug pa'i mtshungs par spyod pa'i chos bca'o// dge slong lam du 'jug pas chu mthong na lhung bzed dang chos gos po/
179b5: ste phyogs gcig tu zhog la/ de nas gos dag kyang sprugs te khrus byos la/ de nas rkang pa dang / lag pa khrus la chu ba yang chu tshags kyis tshogs te ra da gsher bas lham phyis la de'i 'og tu lag pa bsnyal nas bla 'og gi bgo ba legs par gyon la spyod
179b6: lam zhi bzhin gtsug lag khang du 'gro bar bya'o/ / de las gzhan du na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// rkyang ba'i sgo gsum pa'i medo'i tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'o// // mdor na/ spu gri'i ba dar dang sen mo bcad// glang tshar rkang pa'i rten dadi ma
179b7: bshad par bya dang gci ba'i gnas/ / bya ba byas pa mi bcad // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i 'dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'i ra ba na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi phyir spu gri'i snod chongs shig nas
179b8: dka' stsal pa dang / drug sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi spu gri khyer te bya ba byas kyang skra gri blangs nas dadung bya ba yod ces zer nas spu grim ster ro// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

180a1: spu gri bye ba byas nas ma 'chang shig/ bcangs na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// spu gri ngo lte ba de bzhin du ba dang dang / sen mo bcad pa dang / slad tshad dang / rkang pa brten pa rnams so// drag sde de dag gis gci pa'i gnas su zhugs te bya ba
180a2: byas kyang dadung yang slar 'jug go zhes smras nas/ dge slong lhags pa'i rnams 'jug tu mi ster to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis gci pa'i gnas su zhugs te
180a3: bya ba byas na dge slong dag la ma bag gshig/ bgags na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// bshad pa'i sar yang de bzhin no// rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshogs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o// mdor na/ g.yog dang dus ston chen po dang /
180a4: rnyog pa can gyi chu dang ni// lce las brdzis dang sgro ma dang // ster bsdus de bzhin bsgrags pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i 'dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dag rab na bzhugs so// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis
180a5: bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste gnang na bdag gi sen mo dang dbu'i mchod rten la dus ston chen po bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar na gnang gis gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu dang sen mo'i
180a6: mchod rten la dus ston gsol cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag dus ston chen po'i tshe 'dras nas de dag rdzing bu'i nang du lhung bzed rnams bkrus pa dang / gtsug lag khang na gnas pa dang / dge bsnyen dag gis kyang mar dang /
