180a7: 'bru mar dang / zho dang / sprang rtsi'i bum pa rnams kyang rdzing du bkrus pas na lhung bzed rnams dang bum pa de rnams kyi snum dag gis chu'i steng du zhag chags par gyur te/ dal dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas chu mi mthong ngo // de ltar
180a8: gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des kha zas kyi bya ba byed mi nus kyis dkrugs la 'thung shig/ de la the tshom du ma byed cing // chu khor khor yug tu skye bo mang po dag gis

180b1: dkrugs pas na thams cad kyang rnyog pas gang ste gdong gi gzugs brnyan yang mi snang bar gyur/ chu tshags kyang rnyog pas 'gags nas chu mi zag pa dang / de dag la gnod par gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan
180b2: 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ gang na gdong gi gzugs brnyan mi snang ba der lhung bzed chung ngu 'am/ gnod gzhan gyi chus la shing tog ka ta ka'i 'bras bu chug ste/ skad cig sdod la rtogs shig dang nges par gdong gi gzugs brnyan
180b3: yang snong bar 'gyur ro/ / de lta na bu med na zan gyi chad bu chug shig/ de snam med pas zhigs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phye mar du gyis la der chug shig/ chub tshwa ba can du gyur nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes pa dang / bcom
180b4: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste des lan tshwa'i bya ba byed nus na byin len byos la 'thung shig/ de ste bya ba byed mi nus na chus la 'thung shig/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa'o//
180b5: mdor na/ chu dang zho las chur gyur dang // bum pa bum bu'ang de bzhin te// lag pa bsnyal nas 'thung ba dang // dge tshul pha la'ang rnam bzhir bya/ lhung bzed dang ni gdong bkru dang // bsod snyoms pa la rnam pa gnyis// rgyags dang 'bras bu ma
180b6: rtog dag/ phongs na rung gis bza' bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i 'dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong dag khron pa'i nang nas chu bcus te de dag gis gtsags na 'bras
180b7: can thul ma dang khur ba'i dum bu dag byung ngo / / de dag the tshom skyes nas chags pa dang dum bu dag kyang 'khru bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des kha zas kyi bya ba
180b8: byed mi nus kyis phyung ste bor la tshogs sheg/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ dge slong dag rdzing nas chu 'chu ba dang der chu'i bum pa dang sbrang rtsi'i bum pa dag bkrus pa dang / dge slong dag gis kyang lhung bzed snum can dag bkrus so// de dag gis snum

181a1: kyis chu'i steng zhag tu chags par gyur/ zho'i 'bum bu dag kyang snang par gyur nas/ dge slong dag the tshom skyes te ma banus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ das kha zas kyi bya ba byed mi nus kyis chus shig/
181a2: kyi drol mi 'thung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'thung shig bum pa dang ril bdag gi nang du mi ldugs te bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ der lugs shig dge slong dag cig lam du zhugs te/ dong ba dang / den chu med de kyis
181a3: bdag gi sdod nas chu 'dron pa mang po la byin pa dang / dge slong dag gis 'thung du ma btub ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de skye gzhan med na rtogs la 'thung shig/ de dag bum pa dang ril ba'i nang du mi lcags pa dang / de bcom ldan
181a4: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ der yang lugs shig/ phyi dro mi 'thung ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'thung shig/ lam na rdo chu sgrom yod pa dang / gra dge slong dag the tshom skyes te chu ma blangs pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
181a5: dge slong rnams rdo chu sgrom ni bkru bkru ba yin gyis/ togs la 'thung shig/ ril ba dang bum pa dag tu mi ljags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ deng yang lugs shig/ phyi dro mi 'thung ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
181a6: pa/ 'thung shig/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ de bzhin du shing sgom dang / rgyal ba'i nang na 'dug pa yang rtogs la 'thung shig/ phyi dro dang / ril ba dang / bum pa'i nang du yang lugs shig/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ dge slong dag gis dge
181a7: 'dun la chu brims pa dang / de na dge slong dag gis tshe dang ldan pa chu rgyud lhung bzed kyi nang nas mchad pas na bzhugs par gyur to/ zhes smras te/ de dag gis ma blangs so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
181a8: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag lub thams cad kyi rgyud ni thung ngu 'bab kyi steng du mi 'gyur gyis 'thung la de la the tshom ma byed cig/ de bzhin du'o ma dang / zho dang / zho'i chu dang/ dar ba dang / ba mo dang / tshul sogs pa la rgyas par 'arjod/

181b1: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong dag ljongs rgyu zhing spyod pa las glang gi lhas su phyin pa dang / de dag la de na chu med de/ de dag gis zho'i chu byin pa dang / dge slong de dag the tshom skyes nas mi 'khru'o// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis
181b2: bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang na chu med pa zho'i chu dang / dar ba dang pas khras shig/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ dge slong dag giso ba lang rdzil bum pa brnyas pa dang / de dag gis mar
181b3: gyi bum pa dang / 'o ma'i bum pa dag rnyed na de dag the tshom skyes nas ma blangs so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bum pa la nam pa lnga ste/ bshad
181b4: pa'i bum pa dang / gci pa'i bum pa dang / chang gi bum pa dang / 'bru mar gyi bum pa dang / mar gyi bum pa'o// de la snga ma gsum ni ma bzhag pa yang ma bzhag shig/ gzhag na ni rgyang ring por par cig/ 'bru mar gyi bum pa dang / mar gyi bum pa
181b5: ni me'i nang du sregs la de nas lci ba'i ril lu'am/ ba lang gi lci bas rud par gyis la chu chus te/ de snga dro dang phyi dro yang spyod cig/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong gzhan zhig gis bum pa'i nang
181b6: nas chu 'thungs pa dang / bud pas zos so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bum bu'i nang nas chu ma 'thung shig/ 'thung na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur
181b7: ro/ sngar lag pa snyol la kha krus te/ gdod chu 'thung shig/ bum pa'i khagab med par ma gzhag shig/ de bsan ngas gnang gis bum pa'i khag bachongs shig bcom ldan 'das kyis bum pa'i kha lag bachongs shig ces bka' stsal na/ dge
181b8: slong gis kha gab ji ltar bu bcad pa me shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shing las byas pa 'am/ rdo las byas pa'am/ sa las byas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis lag pa stsol la chu 'thung shig ces bka' stsal na/

182a1: lam du zhugs pa dag cig la nA byang bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdab ma dang lhags pa chol pa de'i nang nas 'thung shig/ de yang med par byur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ga/ bag so
182a2: bzhin du shing la chags pa las 'thung shig/ de yang med par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dben par 'jug la bum bu nyid nas 'thung shig/ gzhan gyis ma mthong ba dang mdzes par kyis shig/ dge slong dgang samangs pan gdang ba
182a3: !des 'phongs pa'i tshen ma spyod cig/ spyad na 'das pa dang / bcas par 'gyur ro// nga gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong dag ljongs rgyu bskyod cing dong ba las de dag gis rgyags dge tshul ba dag la bskur ba de dag ma theg nas de dag gis theg la bsrung
182a4: cig ces smras pa dang / dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas pa bteg go// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ theg shig/ dge tshul pa dgang la nas dog ste spang ne smras pa dang /
182a5: dge slong dag gis ma bog nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phog shig/ dge tshul phas ma bzung bzhin gdag pa dang / dbab pa dag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das
182a6: kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge tshul bas ma bzung bar gdeg pa dang / dbab pa ma byed cig/ dge tshul pa dag gis bdag cag chad de dal bsos byed kyis cung zhig byed cig ces smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis ma byed ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bkag
182a7: sngal ga tha gus bcings la tha gu'i rtse mo dge tshul pas zung ste phyi bzhin 'brang du chug la dge slong gis khyed cig/ dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas de la mi za ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la tha tshom du ma byed par po shig dge slong
182a8: dron pa mang po dang lhan cig tu 'grogs te lam du zhugs pa dang / 'dron pa mang pa dag rkun pos bcom pa dang / dege chung kyi phyags rnams pa nas bros to dang // dag slong dag gi rgyags ma byer nas de nyid na par zhing 'dug pa dang / 'dren pas po

182b1: bdag gis 'phags pa byed pa rtsegs rkun pas ma kya'o/ / sasmras pa dang / dege song dag dasu tshum bdag 'dud pa cags yong sa/ zhogagags rnam pa/ drung smya dpa 'ang du mu ste/ lted khyong du
182b2: 'dod/ dang ca mun pas gsang mod ces smras pa dang / de ljang thur pa dag slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyis pa sngal pa/ seng pag da rnam pas sbyin cig/ den slong gi nyis tha marna
182b3: ded/ sa thos pad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka/ 'astsal pa/ del zem ma ma byed par za shig/ klud nas kyang gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa da khyenan mas sa zhes rlopa la/ stanas nas
182b4: legs so/ / snya ma nus so zhes zer na rgyags bdag cag gis khyer la rgal cig/ de la dge slong dag gis rgyags dag pa rol ce bskal bar byan dge tshul bas bsgral bar gyis la brtag par gyis shig/ deste dge tshul pa yang mi nus na /
182b5: slong dag gis rgyags pha rol du sgrol pa/ de'i 'og tu dge tshul pa yang bsgral par gyis shig/ de ste gnyis ga zhus na dge tshul tha dang / rgyags lhan cig tu bsgral bar gyis shig/ gnyig lhan cig tu bsgral ba dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas mthos so//
182b6: de ltar byung dadag slong dag ging bcom ldan 'das la gsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la the tshom dum byeng bar bza' bar gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag lhung bzed du zo shig ces bka' stsal pa
182b7: dang dag slong shig gis srung bzang bzugs nas mthe bos ba bsan sa mi gas napa/ dge slong de la the tshomasbas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgra med par ldan gnyis la gsum du bkrabs thus pa ma pasa~M
182b8: nasgra gsadang bar byang na/ de la the tsom du ma byed pad zo shig/ dge slong gzhan zhig gis lhung bzed dgasabakrus te/ de bugan rdzas kyi tshig la nag mthong ba dang / de the tshom skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

183a1: de la shir bus brus te lan gsum gyi bar du rab tu khrus la de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ dge slong gzhan zhig gis yang lhung bzed gas pa zhig gi nang du khu ba dron po zhig blangs pa dang / de'i 'phro nas snam byung ba dang / zhag steng du
183a2: byung ba dang / dge slong de ba tshom skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ steng gi zhag zhoms la btung bar gyis shig/ dge slong gcig rlung nad kyis btab nas des phyi dro 'u ba zhig 'thungs te/ rub ka lhung bached de'i nang du skam btung zhes byas pa dang /
183a3: lhung bzed kyi nang du snum langs nas de'i steng du zhag chags pa dang / dge slong de the tshom skyes nas skom yang ma 'thungs so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag pa dang kha bkrus nas snum
183a4: zhoms te 'or te de la the tshom du ma byed par 'thung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kha khrus shig ces bka' stsal na/ dge slong dag kha cig bkru ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lci ba 'am sa 'am shing gi shun phrags la sogs pa gzhan gyis so//
183a5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/ btsun pa ji tsam gyis kha bkrus pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khang dang rma gnyis mtshungs te rtag tu zag pas ma 'bags pa mi nus mod kyi len gsum du kha bkrus te chu bor ba ni
183a6: kha bkrus pa zhes bya'o/ / dge slong gcig gis bsod snyoms bslangs te gnas khang du bzhag nas phyi rol du byung ba dang / khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis de'i steng du zas shig blugs te bzhag pa dang / ji tsam bsod snyoms pa de slar 'ongs na bsod snyoms kyi steng
183a7: na zas gzhan zhig blugs par mthong ste/ de the tshom skyes te/ zan ma zos so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste byin len byed pa yod na byin len byos la zo shig/ de ste med
183a8: na steng gi sar pa de logs shig tu 'ong la the tshom du ma byed par zo shig/ dge slong gzhan zhig gis bsod snyoms blangs nas gnas khang du bzhag ste/ phyi rol du song ba dang / de khyim pa zhig gis reg par mthong ste/ dge slong de the tshom skyes nas ma zos so// /

183b1: de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag de la ci'i phyir rag ces dris la/ des rtswa spangs ma dag bsal ba'i phyir reg ces zer na byin len byos la zo shig de ste 'dod pa'i phyir reg go
183b2: zhes zer na de yang phyed mar gos la byin len byos te de la the tshom du ma byed par zo shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag rgyags khyer cig ces bka' stsal na/ khyim pa bdag dang dge tshul pha dag med nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa
183b3: dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin pa'i bdag po spro ba skyed cig/ sbyin bdag kyang med na bdag nyid kyis slar khyer la de khyim pa dang rjes la zo shig/ de ste de la med na skal pa gnyis su chod la khyim pa la byin te/ des khyer na ni de'i skal pa slar spongs
183b4: te byin len byos la zo shig/ bdag gi skal pa ni de la byin na cig/ de ste de ltar yang ma 'byor na nyi ma dang po'i tshe ni bsnyung bar 'dug shig/ phyi de nyin par byin len byed pa med na stag gi spar thabs gcig zo shig/ yang phyi de nyin mo yang byin len byed pa med na
183b5: stag gi spar thabs gnyis zo shig/ de ste zhag bzhi'i nyin mo yang byin len byed pa med na ji tsam 'drangs pa'i bar du ze shig/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ de ste rgyags med na 'bras bu rang ltung ba de long la gdugs tshod la bab kyi bar du khyer te song la de ste khyim
183b6: pa dang phrad na skal pa gnyis su tshod la gcig ni de la byin te/ de'i skal bslad bdag gis slongs la rung bar byos te zo shig/ bdag gi de byin cig/ de ste ma phrad na snga dro 'am/ phyi dro yang rung / rung bar bya ba'i phyir sgra med na srog dang 'bral bas/ the tshom du ma
183b7: byed par zo shig/ de ste yang ltung ba med na shing la 'dzegs te thogs shig/ yang na sbugs la byang phyogs kyi dus su bsngos te zo shig/ de bzhin du rtsa ba la sogs pa yang sa las rang gis brkos te phyung la the tshom du ma byed par zo shig/ ngas khyed la phongs dri
183b8: tsheganang ba de ma phongs pa'i tsham spyod cig/ spyad na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// nga ba'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu ste sgo gsum pa rdzogs s+ho// // mdo bsdus pa ste// sa bon bum btsun po chub dang // lus kyis reg pa de/

184a1: bzhin te// 'bras can lan chu song ba dang / bu ram shing dang dgun 'bru dang // glo zung 'ongs dang gnas pa'o// mdor na/ sa bon bum pa shing rta gru// khur dang 'o ma tshong ba de bzhin te// bya rog sbrad ma btso bla ga las// u pA li bzhi ni
184a2: chog kun shes pa'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'o khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs ste// gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bum pa stong gi mabon btab tha phul ba de'i tshe dge slong dag gis de'i thog zos nam zhing yang tha bar bor
184a3: tenA kun shi'i gnas su gyur to/ / de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po phyi rol du byung bas de dag mthong nas/ des blon po la kye sus 'di ltar zhing kun thabar bor nas ku sha'i gnas su gyur ces smras par// des lha 'phags pa dag la bum pa stong gis
184a4: sapanA kyis btab pa bral bar de dag/ gis legs par blangs pa de dag gtsigs yod ces smras pa dang / rgyal pos ji 'brags pa de dag gis thun meng du yang ma btang ngamanyes de dag gis dge slong dag la smras pa dang / ltar gyur pa ga sa/
184a5: dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi zhing dag ni thun shas su thong shig/ dge slong dag gis thun shas su byin no// zhing bas zhing gshin pa'i rnams ni thams cad bdag cag byer yang de dag
184a6: mags skal pa ma blangs pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhing shas kyi skal pa long shig/ dge slong dag gis blangs te de nyid du bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das
184a7: kyis bka' stsal pa/ skal pa gtsug lag khang du skyos shig ces gsungs pa dang / sngar shing ba nyid kyi der bskyangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon du zhing bdag gis der smros shig/ de dag skyed pa na yang brkus so//
184a8: de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srung ba'i dge slong rnams skos shig/ shing rta'i nang du skyes pa las shing rta chag kyang dge slong gis grogs ma byas pa dang/ khyis

184b1: dug mi dga' bar gyur nas smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di ni ci byed cag gis na byed kyis 'i phyir grogs mi b+ha/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mgan // de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
184b2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ shing rtal byugs 'debs pa'i sa ma gtogs par der bskya ba dang zhing ba'i grogs kyis shig/ dge slong gzhan zhig na par gyur nas/ shi rta bdag gis shing N+DI'i skyeng du non cig ces smras pa dang / de
184b3: ma skyes nas mngon nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nan shing rtu la zhon cig/ de la kyin mim byed cig/ zla na na thun gas kyi rnal ba snyed pa las kyu yang dag par gyur nas/ dge slong dag gis thogs ma byas pa dang / khyim bdag
184b4: dga' bar gyur nas sprus pa'adide byed kyis na/ byad kyis ci'i phyir phyogs mi bya/ de dag gis sgrus pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sam gdang ngo // de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
184b5: gagu'i dngom gtogs par phul ba'i grogs dang zhing ba'i grogs kyis shig/ dge slong gzhan zhig yang klung gi 'gram nas song bas las na bar gyur nas mnyan pas 'phags pa 'di'i nang du zhugs shes smras pa dang / de the tshos skyes nas
184b6: rlung du ba zhugs so/ / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dang ma gtogs par nang du grags pa de la the tshom ma byed cig/ gzhan yang bar gyis bskyes pa las de chad par gyur nas
184b7: des 'phags pa 'di sa log shig ces smras pa dang / dge slong dag tha tsam skyes nas pa phog go// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phog shig/ dge slong dag gis pas
184b8: nanas sla sa bteg pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' thul pa/ di star pog pa bzhin du theg shig/ ste gang gi sgong bor te dong ba dang / mabyin par len pa dag gis btus nes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang du skyos shig/

185a1: dge slong gsi sus nang bu bskya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim pas so// khyim pa med na dge tshul bas so// dge tshul ba yang med nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag
185a2: cag nyid kyis nad du smyos shig/ dge slong dag gis bskyas nas bdag gis bskyes pa yin no snyam nas ma zos pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la the tshom
185a3: ma byed par zo shig/ dge 'dun gyi zangs kyi nang du me tshor 'bar bas lo ma la sogs pa ni kho la/ rung bar byed pa ni sgor song nas po ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de phyi rol du ma 'gro shig/ de ste rkyen cig byung nas
185a4: phyi rol du song na mgal bdag phyir drongs shig/ 'on kyang de bzhin du lung ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma dag ma dag phyir dbyung bar gyis shig/ mdag ma phyir phyung yang lung ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
185a5: stsal pa/ chos gos kyis thams g.yogs shig/ 'on kyang lung bar gyur nas bdag nyid kyis gzar bu long la dkrug par gyis shig/ dge slong dag das phongs pa la gnang ba de ma phongs pa'i tshe ma spyod cig/ spyad na 'das pa dang bcas
185a6: bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du sman dag kyang dge tshul pa 'am/ lha gang na gnas pas dkrug par gyis shig/ de yang phyi rol du song na de'i thabs snga ma bzhin no// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ tshong pa mang po dag cig gis sangs rgyas dang /
185a7: dge slong gi dge 'dun la sogs pa bshos la spyan drangs so// de dag gis bshos sbyar te dro sar bskyas nas ma drangs kyi bar du tshed khang du me shor te de dag me gsod du song ba dang / gdugs tshed yol la thug nas/ dge slong dag gis ji ltar gyur
185a8: babacom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ de'i sems kyis yongs su btang bas na/ dge slong dag de la the tshom ma byed par bza' bar bya'o// zos nas byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi dus su byin gyis rlobs shig/

185b1: dge 'dun gyis dro sar bya rog mchus zas la reg pa dang / dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas zan ma zos so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mchu'i than kor 'ong
185b2: la de la the tshom ma byed par zo shig/ dge slong dag gis lhung bzed kyi kha zas kyi nang du bya rog gis reg nas de dag kha zas ma zos pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i mchu'i than kor 'oral the tshom ma byed par bza' bar
185b3: gyis shig/ tshe dang ldan pa nam gru ci la yang the tshom za ste/ nam gru the tshom can nam gru the tshom can zhes ming du gyur to// de bshang sar 'ongs pa dang / sbrang ma zhig mthong ngo // phyis yang de dang 'dra ba zhig bskos na zas kyi steng na 'dug
185b4: pa mthong ba dang / des tshe dang ldan pa dag bshad sa na mthong ba'i sprad ma des 'dir 'ongs te/ kha zas la 'bags te ma rung bar byas so zhes smras pa dang / de thos pa dang dge slong mang zhig gse zas ma zos par gyur to// de ltar gyur pa/
185b5: dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams sprang ma ni mthon dman kun du rgyus des gang du reg pa de 'or la de la the tshom du ma byed par zo shig/ dge slong dag
185b6: the tshon rtsi'i las byed de/ de dag sems 'khrul pas tshon rtsi'i bum pa yin no snyam nas des dge 'dun gyi 'bru mar gyi bum pa dang / mar gyi bum bdag steng du bteg ste khyer ba dang / de na gang gi tshe ngo shes pa de'i tshe na 'greng bzhin du
185b7: bor nas chag pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyisi bka' stsal pa/ thad ma skas la 'dzegs pa las cung zad tsam zhig ni 'dzegs mang du las na slar bobs la gnas
185b8: gar bde bar ma 'gyel bar zhog shig/ de ste thad maskas la mang du 'dzegs la thung ngu 'dzegs dgos na steng du 'dzegs la gnas bde bar ma 'gyel bar zhog shig/ dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas ma zos pa dang / de

186a1: ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la the tshom ma byed par zo shig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus
186a2: btsun pa bzhag pa rnam pa du 'tshal du rung / u pA li rnam pa gnyis kyis te/ ngo tsha ba med cing bslab pa la mi mos pa dang / gang la ngo tsha yod kyang dran pa nyams pa te/ de gnyis kyis bzhag pa rung gis gnyi ga zo shig/ bcom
186a3: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byol song gi skye gnas su gyur pa'i sems can la sbyin pa byin na ni rnam par smin pa brgyar re bar bya'o// tshul khrims ngan pas zin pa'i mi la sbyin pa byin na ni rnam par smin pa stong du re bar bya'o// tshul khrims
186a4: dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag la sbyin pa byin na ni rnam par smin pa brgya phrag stong du re bar bya'o/ / phyi rol gyi drang srong 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba dag la sbyin pa byin na ni rnam par smin pa sa a brgya stong du re bar bya'o// rgyun du
186a5: zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byed par zhugs pa la ni tshad med do/ / rgyun tu zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byed par zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do// lan cig phyir ldog par rgyun du
186a6: zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do/ / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byed par zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i rgyun du zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do// dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du
186a7: byed par zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do/ / dgra bcom pa la de bas kyang tshad med na rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la lta smos kyang ci dgos bram ze dang khyim bdag
186a8: dad pa dag gis dge slong dag mchod rten la phyag 'tshal du dong ba la gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag bskur ba dang / dge slong dag rnam pa de lta bu'i rkyen byung nas de dag gis gang du bskur bar bskur ma nuso// de dag gi nang nas

186b1: kha cig gse smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa na gzhan du bsngos la gzhan du dbul bar ma byed cig ces byung / kha cig gis yang smras pa/ de la gzhan byar ci yod/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag
186b2: gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams rnam pa bzhi la ni nges par dkyil dgos te byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo dang / tshe 'phrul chen po dang / lha yul nas gshegs pa'o// 'di dag la bsngos nas gzhan du
186b3: bsngo bar ma byed cig/ de las gzhan du bsngos pa'i rkyen rnam pa de lta bus na gzhan dag tu bstor rung gsi de la the tshom ma byed cig/ dge slong rnams ngas phongs pa'i tshe gnang ba de bzhin du mthongs pa'i tshe ma spyod ceg// de ltar spyad na 'das pa dang bcas par
186b4: 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong gnyis shig 'khrug par gyur/ rtsod par gyur/ 'thab par gyur pa de la gang med par gzung / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang tshul khrims dang ldan
186b5: pa'o/ / gnyis ga tshul khrims dang ldan pa na gang mang du thos pa'o// gnyi ga mang du thos na gang chog shes pa'o// gnyi ga chog shes na gang cher chog shes pa'o// gnyi ga cher chog shes na u pA li gnyi ga cher cho ga shes pa las cher chog shes pa ni med de mi
186b6: srid do/ / gnas med de de gnyis lta bu la ni 'khrug pa 'am/ rtsod pa'am/ 'thab par 'gyur ba 'byung ba'i gnas ma yin no// rgyang ba'i sgo'i mdo bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang po'o// // 'dral ba gzhung dam pa/ bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa/ medang
186b7: rkun po gnas dang za ma dang / / sngar 'khrugs pa la rnam pa bzhi// bslab pa byin pas tshul shing brims// de dag dge 'dun dbyen mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i 'dze ta'i tshal mgon med pa la zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
186b8: ba na bzhugs so/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/ btsun pa tshul shing bris pa rkun gnas kyis tshul shing brims na dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur ram/ u pA li mi 'gyur ro// btsun pa ma neng

187a1: da ma pa dge yongs byu bdang / pa bab pa dang / sa bas pa dang / dag pa ma dpa dang/ dan gaganasag gapas byung bang/ mu ga san du/ gartag yan du song ba dang /
187a2: dang gnas pa dang / mi gnas pa dag gis tshul shIng bri mas na dge 'dun b+hi byen du 'gyur ram/ A pAk+She'e mi rangango // btsun pa sngar 'khrub pa pa pon pa rgyal shing brims na/ dge 'dun gyi darten du 'gyur ram/ A pa 'i/
187a3: mi gyur ro// btsun pa slab pabyin papa rnyis shing brims na dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur ram/ ba la mo'i byer ro// rkyong ba'i ska bzhi pa'i mda'i tshogs su bcad pa gnyis pa'o/ ma da na khris la rag
187a4: zan dang / chang pa 'bab pa bcad mi bya/ tshad mad dang ni bshad gcen/ ma rung nas ni mi 'dor ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i 'dze pa sa mgon med pa la zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ban badz+ra/
187a5: so// drug sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi ma la stan dag kyang lus le reg par bgos// rkang pa nas 'gro bo'i bar du thang chad par bgos pa dang / dka gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus
187a6: nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis dge 'dun gyi ma la stan lus la reg par ma bgo shig/ bgos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag dge 'dun/
187a7: gyim la stan rdzas la reg par ma bgo TIg ces bka' stsal ba na/ dge slong dgu gis dz+wa lA d+ha bkra ba mi shes nas/ daltar gyur pa deg slong drug gis bcom ldan 'ab la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'as kyi sna
187a8: stsal pa/ / gang zag gis rdul zan gyi steng du shes bzhin tu dbanas/ khad kyis bgo bar gyis shig/ drug sde dgags dge 'dun gyi mi gas nas/ dbyar cher gyi nang na thagab med par 'jug go// de tshar gyis ma

187b1: rung bar gyur nas/ de ltar gyur par dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis dge 'dun gyi gos gyon la/ dbyar char kyi nang na bla gab med par ma 'dug shig/
187b2: 'dug na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// drug sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi gos bgos nas tshang mang du 'jug ste/ de bdud pas ma rung bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
187b3: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis dge 'dun gyi gos gyon nas tshang mang du 'gro bar ma byed cig/ song na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// drug sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi mal stan dag bgos nas bshad ga ci'i sar song ba dang /
187b4: bkad gci gsar ma dag gis phog nas ma rung bar gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi mal stan gyon nas bshad gcing sar ma 'gro shig
187b5: song na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ / gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong rnams dge 'dun gyi mal snyan rdol ba dang / ral pa rnams gang bab bab tu 'dor te/ de dag mi spyod pa dang / de nyid ma rung bar 'gyur nas/ de ltar gyur pa/ dge slong
187b6: dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi mal stan cung zad rdol tam/ ral na ma 'dor bar rdol na ni ldan pas blon cig/ ral na ni blar grub shig/ de'i nang na rnying pa dag ni gol phyung
187b7: la sar pa klon cig/ de rnyed pa las su rung ba yod nim mar gyi snying por gyis shig/ deng yang mi rung na ba glang gi lci ba 'am/ sa dang sra ba la ka ba'i ser ga 'am/ rtsig pa'i se ra ga dag gi zhal zhal du gyis shig/ sbyin par byed pa dang / yon
187b8: bdag gi yun ring du smad par 'gyur ro/ / rgyang ba'i sgra bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'o// mdor na// kha zas de ste ma mar dang // byug par bya dang lha ma rnams dang // gos dang gdugs dang shing dag dang /

188a1: rtsa bstan rnams tha ma'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i 'dzi ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dang rab na bzhugs so// mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig 'dug ste/ des yo byad thams cad dang ldad pang gtsug lag khang btsigs
188a2: ste'abor mang po'i dge slong dag cig 'dul lo/ / de 'khor drug bcu dang / der dbyang tshul du bzhugs so// tshul nas byung nas lhan cig spyod pa dang / nyen ma dag ljongs dang / phyags gang dang / gang du 'khod pa de dngag / de dag nas da' gang pa la phyag bya bar
188a3: lhags nas/ de dag gis de'i rkang pa la phyag byas te dong pa dang / des tshe dang ldan pa rnams de khyim bdag 'di zhes bya bas 'gron du bas kyis khyod 'di nyid du 'khod cig ces smras pa dang / de dag gis smras pa mkhan po 'chi'o// des smras pa/ 'o na 'khod de can tho
188a4: la deng shig/ de dag gis smras pa/ zas dang yo byad khyer te mchis la/ de nyid bdag cag 'tshal lo// de sa 'o na legs kyis de bzhin du byos shig ces smras pa dang / zas dang yo byad dag khyer te dong ngo // de bzhin du kha cig gis me mar gyi mar/ kha
188a5: cig gis ni rkang pa byug pa/ kha cig gis ni lha ma dag/ kha cig gis ni gos dag/ kha cig gis ni gdugs dag/ kha cig gis ni shing dag/ kha cig gis ni rtsa ba dang / sdod bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i sman
188a6: rnams khyer te/ dong pa dang / ring po ma lon par gtsug lag khang de yo byad kyis brel bar zung nas dge slong de khyim bdag gdan ba der song ste phyin pa dang / khyim bdag khyod kyi yo byad dag ni zad do// zhes smras pa dang / 'phags pa de na
188a7: dge slong nyud la yo byad mang du dul na ci'i phyir myur du bas zhes smras pa dang / de dag gis rgyas par smras nas/ des 'phags la bdag gis ni de na bzhugs pa rnams kyi phyir phul na/ de dag gzhan na gnas la ci'i phyir gzhan du spyod cig ces nyes pa dong
188a8: brjod do/ / da ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams yon bdag de 'phya ba ni yus te/ de bas na dge slong dag gis gzhan du gnas shing / gzhan gyi khyer ba ma spyod ci//

188b1: dge slong dag gzhan du gnas la gzhan gyi spyad dang / de dag ji tsam spyad pa/ thams cad rin thang bzhin du thob shig rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o// mdo na mtshan ma dang / yang sngon mtshan dang / bar tang ngag dang ri mo can
188b2: khre'u rkang pa ri ma can/ ral tshems bya bar byer ma khang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das san du yod pa na 'dze ti'i 'tshal mgon med pacas sbyin gyi kun dka' rang na gzhugs s+ho// sanyan du yod pa na mi spyan gnyis shig rab tu byung ste/ de las gcig ni
188b3: zhal ta ba'i gnas 'angan 'jug go/ / gcig ni mdze ta'i 'tshal na'o// ji na men zhal ta bdi don shig gi/ byir ri brags kyi grong du song ngo // dge slong de phun pa blta ba'i phyir re// bag bde bgos na sa de'i thang du song // dab dge 'dun gyi brko
188b4: pa'i nang du gang zag gi bgo bde bzhag nas gtam 'dzed cing 'khod do/ / de nas nor te dge 'dun gyi bgo ba zhag gyon te song ngo // de nas zhal ta ba de slar 'ongs nas de na bgo ba chung ngu zhig mthong ste/ des tshe dang ldan pa ci dge 'dun gyis rnyed pa
188b5: grub pa'am/ zhes smras pa dang / des smras pa/ dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa cad med do// bgo ba 'di su'i 'di dag dge 'dun gyi'o// des smras pa/ ded cag ni cha/ 'di chud na/ 'dir su yang bgo ba gyon te mdzengs sam/ 'dir bdag gis phu nu bo zhig 'ongs/
188b6: so// song la dris shig/ de song nas dris te/ des bltas nas dge 'dun gyi yin nas/ des smras pa/ bdag gis nor te/ dge 'dun gyi ni bdag gis khyer/ bdag gis ni de na 'dug pa'i rigs so// des de khyer te 'ongs so// de ltar gyur pa/ dge
188b7: slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi ni mtshan ma thob shig/ dge slong dag gis ji ltar mtshan ma bdag mi shes na bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
188b8: 'di zhes bya bas phul ba'o/ / zhes yi ger bris shig/ dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi dang / gang zag gis gnyi ga de bzhin du bris so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

189a1: gang zag gi ni mngon mtshan thobashig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis be/ 'dun gyi'am/ gang zag gi yang rung ste/ ri mo can gyis gting ba med kyis bar du ma stor cig ces bka' stsal pa dge slong dag gang bag gi
189a2: ba gar stan byed pa la grags pa dang / de na nas pacig gis smras pa/ yom ldan 'das kyis ni mod pa pa rnyed pa ni ga dang / nga ta la byas pa na ma yin no// zhes gsungams// gzhan gags ya byas pa'i dus pa rmongs shig cas
189a3: padang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong / com ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbas na dge 'dun byin par tang ri mo can rnyed dam byas na yang rungango // gang zag gis de gzhan gyis byin na yon bdag nyid la bsngos na
189a4: rang bar gnang gi/ rang byed du ni mi gnang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun la ni bar tang ri mo can rnyed pa 'am/ byas pa 'ang 'chang du gnang gi/ gang zag la ni gzhan gyis byin pa de nyid la bsdas na 'chang du gnang ngo // zhes bka' stsal nas/ dag
189a5: slong gzhan zhag gas khri'u rkang pa ri mo can zhig bdag gis ni ma byas gzhan gyis byin pa 'chang ngo / / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag das ri mo can ni dgongs te
189a6: gsus kyi/ thetsun pa'i mnal can kyis dpas da ldan na rkang pa ri ba can dang bzlas kyang rung dang gi/ gang ga 'di rnaMs sam ga dang // semaldan mas kyi dag nga ba byar rgyanas byung sa ljongs rgya
189a7: ces gsungs pa dang / dbyar tshul du zhugs nas khang pa'i ral 'tshams cha dag ma byas par dong nas de dag gis ral 'tshams ma byas pas/ ma rung bar gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
189a8: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong ma dbyar tshul du zhugs na ral tshems ma byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// rkyang ba'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshogs su bcad balnga pa'o// mdor na/ song nas slar 'ongs sbyin pa med// sbyin nas

189b1: phyir yang 'ongs par 'gyur/ / dge 'dun gyis kyang sbyin par bya// gang las bskyis par 'gyur ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i de dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// khyim pa zhig gis gis
189b2: gnyen zhig dus 'das te mchod pa'i phyir rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis grangs nas dur khrod du bskyal te/ de slar khyer te 'ongs nas dge slong dag la phul ba dang / dge slong dag gis ma blangs so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
189b3: gsol bapa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ song na slar 'ongs pa zhes byos la long shig/ kha cig ni dbul te phul ba de slar yang brnyas pa dang / dge slong dag gis ma gter to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de skye slar long la byin cig/
189b4: des brnyas nas de slar 'gyod pa skyes nas mi des slar yang phul ba dang / dge slong dag gis ma blangs te/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong da gis bcom ldan 'das gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de nas slar yang 'ongs so// zhes byo te
189b5: long shig/ del ba com dang khro bar ma byed cig/ gleng gini ni nyad du yod pa na ste/ zhal ta byed pa'i dge slong zhig gis dag du gya byar khyib pa zhig pa da ni bsgyi pa dang / de dus pas 'das 'o// nga las 'das sa ne sa thos napa de ga gtsug lag khang du 'angs
189b6: nas dris pa/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba zhig gi re zhes smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis smras pa/ de dus las 'das so// des smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gi nor zhag des bskyis so// dge slong dge gis smras pa/ song la de nyid la dris shig
189b7: des dge 'dun gyi phyir khyer gyi pha ma dang bdag gi phyir ma lags kyis khyod kyis stsol shig de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste dge 'dun gyi phyir des khyer bar shes
189b8: nas/ / dge 'dun gyis sbyin pa byin cig/ dge slong rnams ngas las gsar du byed pa'i mtshungs pa'i dge slong gis chos bca'o// las gsar du byed pa'i dge slong gis bskyi ba dag rgan zhing rgan bdag la dris la long shig/ las gsar nga byed

190a1: ba rnams kyis mtshungs par spyad pa'i chos bcas pa bzhin du ma byas na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// rkyang ba'i sgo bzhi pa'i 'od cigs su car ba drug pa'o// mdar na/ bu ram shing dang dge slong rnams// za zhing bgo ba phan bdags
190a2: pa/ mi bgo ba dang bzhi pa dang // skar ma bstan par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das man du yod pa na 'dze ta'i 'tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge 'dun dag gis bca' ba bu ram shing zhig rnye de bcom ldan 'das kyi dge tshul
190a3: ba dag la sum na khyen ci ces bka' stsal nas/ de dag la bur ma shing gi sum cha re byin na// dge slong gong dag rgan rims su 'khod nas dral nyi rim du gyur pas/ slar yang rgad rims kyi thig tu 'ongs so// tshe dang lnga ldag can 'dzi zhe bcom ldan 'das kye
190a4: spyan sngar 'dug ste/ debu ram shing gi dum bu za zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du mi lta zhing 'dug go// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa skyug can 'dzin bu ram shing 'dod dam/ nges smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lo// de nas
190a5: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku skal las bcad de/ dum bu cig de la byin nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bu ram shing gi bya ba byas te/ tsug lag khang du 'ongs padang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgrag can 'dzin bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal
190a6: ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du 'ongs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ cha dang ldan paspyan can 'dzin bu ram shing gi bza' bas tshim par 'gyur tam/ de nas so pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi rnyed pa ni sum cha cig stsol ci
190a7: pa 'phrul pas gra chim yod ky-i/ btsam ldan 'das kyis bka sum padas dag kyis pa // bcom ldan das kyis dge slong gi ge 'dun dag bsus nas dge slong dgal 'ad/ sa pag phrul pa/ sags kyi zabapa ni da rdzu
190a8: bdag sum ma cig byin cig ces byas kyi/ kha zas kyi 'thob pa dag ni mtshungs par gos shig/ chung ngu ni shing bu la sa lo matsam yang mnyam par gos shig/ de las che chung ngu bgos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi na

190b1: mnyan du yod pa na ste/ mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gnas pa de dus dus so rdo ti 'tshal du 'gro ba las dge slong zhig gis de la nor las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi dngos po bdun rgya cher bsnyen par bshad pa dang / de dang bskyes nas gtsug lag khang zhig gcig
190b2: der dge slong gang dag gnas pa de dag kha zas 'phral 'phral du sbyor bar byed pa las des de dgis khazas kyi rgyur ka sha baN dag cig byin pa las/ de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bdag cag bas snyoms la 'gro bas chos gos kyis brel gyi zas kyi
190b3: ni ma yin gyis/ kar sha pa Na ni chos gos kyis phyir bgo'o// dge slong bag cag las su yang khyim bdag de'i khyim du ma 'dod cig ces de dag gis dam bcas so// de nas dus phyi zhig na bsod snyoms pa zhig ljongs rgyu ba spyod cing mnyan du yod par phyin te/ de khyim
190b4: bdag de'i tsug lag khang du 'ongs nas/ dge slong dag gis de ngal sor cug ste/ gnas dang mal stan dag byin nas des bsams pa/ de ring la dal bso zhing za na yang gral du zos la nang bar nas bsod snyoms blang ngo snyam du sems shing 'dug pa las
190b5: dge slong gzhin 'khod pa dag lhung bzed dang / chos gos khyer te bsod snyoms la dod pa dang / bsod snyoms pa des bsams pa/ gzhi dag na gnas pa'i dge slong dag ni de ltar phongs pa lta na/ bdag kyang de 'dra bar gyur gyis/ bsod snyoms slong du 'gro'o snyam
190b6: nas/ das lhung bzed dang chos gso dang lde mig dang / lde mig kyog po dang / sgo lcags kyang khyer nas mnyan du yod par rims kyis bsod snyoms la bzhugs pa las khyim bdag de'i khyim du 'ongs nas/ des de la bde bar phyin tam/ zhes tshig tu klas/ stan ting rkang pal/
190b7: phyag byas nas de'i 'dun du 'dug go/ de de'i 'dun du 'dug nas des de la nor las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi dngos po bdun du yon tan bshad pa dang / khyim bdag des smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gis de thams cad bsgrubs lags so// bsod snyoms pas smras pa/
190b8: khyim padag spyod kyis chung cad kyang byung ba med de/ khyod kyi gtsug lag 'dan thog mang 'azas med do// dab smras pa/ 'phags pa cig sung/ bdag gis de mang da pral na/ 'phags pas gzhan zhigi tu byin tonor ba ska ga/ bsod stoms pa des smras pa/
190b9: kyil bdag khyod kyis gtsug lag lang gi mig dang sde mig phyag po dag shes sa ma lags pa 'tshal lo// des bram ga dang sde mig cig po dag bstan pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pas de da gro bar chung shes smras pa dang / sod rnams pas

191a1: slar song ngo / / khyim bdag kyang de'i phyi bzhin du song ste/ gtsug lag khang du 'dug nas ji tsam dge slong dag bsod snyoms khyer te 'ong ba// mthong ste mthong nas des 'phags pa khyod cag gang nas byon ces smras pa dang /
191a2: de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag spyod yul gyi dad pa skyed pa'i phyir ro// 'phags pa ka sha ba na gar mchis/ khyim bdag gnas khang na yod do/ snoms te skyon/ de dag gis phyung ste byin no// de smras pa/ spyod yul gyi dad pa
191a3: bskyed du bzhud cig/ de dag gis ma spobs nas/ cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyim bdag de 'bya ba ni yus te/ de bsan
191a4: rnam pa bzhis ni ma bkon shig/ de ni mchod rten thams cad kyi dang / phyogs bzhi dge 'dun thams cad kyi dang / nad gagos kyi rin thams cad dang / zas nang ma thams cad de// gleng gzhi ni snyan du yod pa na ste/ drug sde dag ljongs rgyu bskyed
191a5: cing skar ma shar tsam zhig gtsug lag khang zhig du phyin pa dang / dge slong de dag gis gang du mdza' ba'i gnas su dal bas zheng 'dug rtsa ba/ cug pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ci zhig pa dang du yod/ ston pa bzhugs bzhin du bstan pa zhig
191a6: par bya 'am/ rgan rims bzhan du ci'i phyir mi bgo// de dag ji ltar rgan rims bzhin du bged pa la zhugs pa dang / gsar bu dag ma bgos par na ma nangs so// de dag nam nangs po// de dag nam nangs pa dang langs te/ tshe dang ldan pa dang
191a7: langs te/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ded cag 'dod gis mal stan long shig/ dge slong dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag skad cig 'khod pa'i phyir/ khyod kyis dge 'dun thams cad la gnod pa byas so// de dag gis smras pa/ de ni sngon
191a8: pa'i bka' lung bzhin no/ / de ltar gyur pa/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag skar ma shar phan chad mal stan ma bgo/ shig/ dgos na 'das pa dang bcas par

191b1: 'gyur ro/ / mal stan bged pas kyang ma bgo shig/ bgos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// rkyang ba'i sgo ba zhi ba'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'o// / mdor na rkun 'bru dang yang 'bra go gzhan/
191b2: mes rung ba yang de bzhin te// zhugs thab mar me sdod bu dang // drang srong chen pos gnang ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul kun nas ljongs rgyu ba spyod cing // ro hi ta gar gshegs te/ ro hi ta ga'i gnod sbyin bal glang ldan zhes bya ba'i
191b3: gnas na bzhugs so/ / de nas gnod sbyin pa glang ldan bcom ldan 'das gad na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs lam go bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa do nub bdag gis gnas su dge slong gi dge
191b4: 'dun dang thabs cig tu bzhugs par ci gnang de nas gnod sbyin bal glang ldan la bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar zhal gyis bzhes so/ / de nas gnod sbyin pa la glang ldan bcom ldan 'das cang mig sung bar zhal gyi sa bzhes par rigs nas/ des gtsug lag khang lnga/ brgya
191b5: sbrul/ stan nang tshad can dang / la ba dang / sngas grub bzhi pa dag kyang lnga brgya lnga brgya sbrul/ me me dag rung ba med pa bkad pa brgya yang sprul te// de nas bcom ldan 'das la ni gtsug lag khang chen po bskos// de'i lhag ma dag ni dge slong dag la bskos te gtsug lag
191b6: khang gi lhag ma dge slong dag la bskos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/ phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sang ba dag gis khyim du dge slong
191b7: gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bshos gsel bar ci gnang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bas na/ gnod sbyin pal glang ldan la cang mi gsung bas zhal gyis bzhes pa dang / gnod sbyin bal glang ldan gyi grogs po kha che'i yul na gnod sbyin u ni ko zhes
191b8: bya ba zhig yod de/ des de la sad bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par bshos la span drangs kyis stod phyogs kyi shing nags kyi shing thog las skur ces bsgying ba dang / des rgun 'bru dang / bal po'i se'u dang / 'bra gos

192a1: la sogs pas snod bkang ste/ gnod sbyin gyi lag tu bskur ro// de btsug lag khang shi ga rang srungs bte gzhag go/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di cig zhig lags/ bcom nan 'das kyis gar/
192a2: sprul ba/ dge slong rnas pa 'den stong phyogs kyi nags kyi shing theg go/ dge slong dag gis ji ltar ba rtse zhes gsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'as kyis ga' byul ba/ mes ru se la thog ge/ dge slong dag gis ring nas rung ba sdus pa dang / bcom ldan
192a3: sa kyis bka'asprul pa/ ba mir byung sa la gzum papa bzhi mas reg par dbyas pas dra bar gyur // dge slong rnams kyis de dag sa bar byas nas dge 'dun dag la bribs pa dang / lhag nas dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas/
192a4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag kun nyes la nang du chus lugs te/ deng tshags kyis rmo/ sa byi dro'i sdom du 'thung shig/ de dag gi kyi dro'i skom du brims pa na/ 'on kyang lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka 'phrul pa/ k+kol te 'og/
192a5: ladi'i bya gi so bdu rims shig/ gleng bzhi ni mnyan du med pa ste/ dgran gyi dram sa sa dge slong rnams rang ste/ gsheltar ba'i steng dus bus pa dang / shining dag ma rungs par gyur nas/ cos ldan nas kyis pa/ 'phrul pa gzhi lta ba'i ltung
192a6: du ma mdung par zhugs ling gi steng du me bus shig/ zhugs ling gi steng du me bus pa dang rung bar 'gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi rol tu bzhugs ling ge nang du bus la rung ba med pa dang / mdags pa mi dang spyod cig/
192a7: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ bzo bo zhig gis dge slong rnams lam mar gyi sdong bu yal gcig pa zhig byin pa dang / de dag gis ma blangs so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
192a8: kyikyi bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun la mar me'i sdong bu la la/ gcig pa/ grub napo dang ngo // gang zag la yang gnang / yal ga gnyis pa 'am/ yal ga ma po dag ni dge 'dun la gnang gi gang zag la ni mi gnang ngo //

192b1: rgyad pa'i sgo ba'i zhi ba'i mdo'i tshigs su brgyud pa'o// mdor na glo bur gnyis po bya ba dang // chu klung pha rol gnyis po dang // mang du ma rung byas pa dang // lus kyi dzadi ni chos gos so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
192b2: 'das mnyan du yod pa mdzin te'i 'tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / dge slong glo bur du lhags pa dag cigags/ lag khang du phyin pa dang / gzhe na gnas pa'i dge slong gis dal bsor bcug go// de dag ngal sos
192b3: zin pa dang / de dag gis ci yod pa brkus te 'dong ngo // de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis coms ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po mi shes pa'i rnams ngal bsor ma gzhug shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
192b4: do mi shes par ngal bsod ma bzhug shig ces bka' stsal nas do ma shes pa zhig ral bsar bcug pa dang / de'i phyi bzhin du do mi shes pa'i dge slong zhig khengs te/ dge slong de phyi rol du song ba dang / ngas de'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos dag len pa la zhugs pa
192b5: dang / gzhi de nas gnas pa'i dge slong gis bsams pa/ 'di ni gdon mi za bar da' grags po zhig go snyam nas/ des de ma bgags nas des de khyer te bros so// phyis dge slong de slar 'ongs na chos gos dang / lhung bzed mi gnang nas/ des smras pa
192b6: tshe dang ldan pa bdag gis lhung bzed dang / chos gos dag sus zer/ gzhan gnas pa'i dge slong gis smras pa/ khyod kyi grogs pos khyer ro// des smras pa/ nga dang do shes pa ni med kyi de'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos khyod kyis
192b7: bor gyis/ khyod kyis sbyin pa byin cig/ de dang dge slong gnyen gnas pa dang / lhan cig tu gcigs gcig rtsod par gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
192b8: ba/ gle bur du 'ongs pa'i dge slong la 'di su zhig ces dris shig/ de ste dge slong dengs ngo shes so// zhes zer na dge slong de la de ste khyod kyis lhung bzed dang chos gos sam/ nga'i yang ru 'di de/ phreng na sbyin la ba sbyin zhes dris shig/ de snyam

193a1: sbyin cig ces zer na rin thang bzhin du chod la phob shig/ de ste byin cig ces zer ba las khyer na khyer du zad do// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa gzhan zhig gzhin 'dug pa'i dge slong zhig gis nga la bsor bcug nas
193a2: de'i phyi bzhin ngo mo shes pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs te/ ji tsam na gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong de so shing 'dor du phyi rol du song ngo // de nas de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos dag des khyer ba dang / glo sngar du 'ongs pa'i dge slong dag gis bsams pa/ 'di yang sngon khyim 'di
193a3: na gnas pa zhig yin no snyam nas das kyang cung zad kyang ma smras nas/ des khyer te bros so// gzhin gnas pa'i dge slong de slar 'ongs pa dang / lhung bzed dang chos gos mi snang nas/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa nga'i lhung bzed dang chos gos sus byer/ des smras
193a4: pa/ gnas khang na 'dug pas khyer ro// de'i gnas khang na gnas pa gang yin khyod kyis lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer gyis sbyin pa byin cig/ de dang de gnyis lhan cig rtsod par gyur nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
193a5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glo bur du 'ongs pa'i dge slong gis gzhin gnas pa'i dge slong la dge slong 'di khyod kyi cung zad ci yang rung ba slong na sbyin nam mi sbyin zhes dris shag/ de lta na ma sbyin cig ces zer na rin thang bzhin du phob shig/ de ste byin
193a6: cig ces zer ba las khyer na khyer du zad do/ / gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong zhig gis gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong zhig la chos gos bzhag nas tshams bzhag pa/ de ster song gi 'og tu nga'i slob ma dag 'ongs te 'dod ces zer na byin cig ces smras
193a7: ma ma / / gyu man shis chos gas byeng zlas pa// la ga/ nga sa rgyas / gca tshad pang drung nas/ de ltar byang ba slong gagis bcom ldan 'das la gsopa pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' phrul pa/ de grob sa la na
193a8: tsig ces zer gdas khyer bani byed rgyal du da mod ci gta tshigs yod/ byin cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gtan chags pa dan gyi ces paka' stsal ba dang / gtan tshigs kun gyis shes shing zags par gli ba tigazhan gyis thos nas sus

193b1: pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ste gtan tshigs skyes shig/ de yang gtan tshigs 'di 'dra bar shes pa zhig 'das na de la byan cig ces so// shig/ dge slong dgag cig la mdu bzhugs nas krung gi 'gram du zin te de klu'i nang du
193b2: zhugs pa dang / den dge slong gzhan zhig 'drag pa la gru'i nang du zhugs pas smras pa/ bdag gis chang thur 'i ni tshur stsol ces smras pa dang / des tshang thur byan pa la zhugs pa las lhung ste chus khyer ba dang / des smras pa/ kho bo'i tshad thung khyed kyis
193b3: bor gyis/ khyod kyis sbyin pa byin cig/ de gnyis rtsod par gyur pa dang / dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyi lag tu 'ongs sam/ zhes smos la 'ongs so zhes zer na gdod byin cig/
193b4: de las gzhan du na rin thang bzhin du tshed la phob shig/ yo byad gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du sbyor cig/ ji ltar klung bzhin du ri la 'dzeg pa dang / 'obs la sogs pa la yang de bzhin du sbyar te/ lag tu 'ongs kyis thong zhes zer de btang ba las stor na
193b5: ni stor du zad do/ / gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ gtsug lag khang zhig na gtsug lag khang skyong gis sgo rab tu ma bsdams nas rab tu ma brtags pas rkun po ngag gis glags rnyed de brkus so// dge slong dag zhing de'i sbyin pa ni gtsug lag khang skyong la/
193b6: dbab pa zhes 'phya'o// da ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sgo bsdam pa ni rnam pa lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ rgya gtan dang / sgo gtan dang / 'khor lo dang / sgo lcags dang /
193b7: lde mig kyog po dag go/ gal te de thams cad gtsug lag khang na yod la gtsug lag khang skyong gis bzhi bcug 'di gcig ma bcug na cha gcig de la phob shig gsum bcug la gnyis ma bcug na gsum de la phob shig/ gnyis bcug la gsum ma
193b8: bcug na sum ched la phob shig/ gcig ma bcug la bzhi bcug na bzhi cha de la phob shig/ de ste thams cad ma bcug na ji tsam stor ba de thams cad de la phob shig/ de ste bsdam pa rnam pa lngas bsdams na stor ba ni stor du zad do// gtsug lag khang na

194a1: gtsug lag khang skyong la sbyin pa ma dbab shig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis chos gos khru tshang
194a2: dgyes shig ces bka' stsal na/ btsun pa khru thung la lus ring na da yang tshas gos khwa tshang du bgyi 'am/ u pA li de ni lus kyi tshad du gyis shig/ gang lus 'thung la khru rang na dzi de yang lus kyi tshad du bgyi 'am/ bcom ldan 'das las ka
194a3: sprul pa/ u pA li lus thung la khru ring na de yang lus kyi tshad du gyis shig/ lus kyang che la khru yang ring na bu tshad du gyis shig/ gzhan du na 'das pa dang bcas pa ste/ ji ltar bcas pa las lhag pa zhig rnyed na yang de la ni byin gyis mi brlab mad
194a4: kyi 'on kyang rung la byin gyis brlab ste rung bar byas na/ slob dpon nam/ mkhan po'am/ mdza' bo'i yin par sngos la spyod cig/ rkyang ba'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa'o// // mdor na/ sham thabs rjes su gnang ba dang // sha ma
194a5: thabs 'theb kyang de bzhin te/ / stod chags mchod pa bya ba dang // byin len ma byas de bzhin ste// rdul dang rkyang ba bstan pa brjod// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na 'dze ta'i tshal mgon med pa la zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs/
194a6: so/ dge slong dag dpyid kyi dus la bab pas sham thabs rnams rdul gyis dri ma mi zhim par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ma thabs kyi 'theb chongs sheg/ sbyar ma yang rdul te drim nim par gyur nas/ bcom ldan pa das
194a7: kyis bka' stsal pa/ stod chags chongs shig/ de yang de bzhin du dri mi zhim par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong chags kyi 'theb bcang bar bya ste/ de yang dus dus su khrus shig/ gleng gzhi na mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge/
194a8: slong rnams choso gas kyin te mchod pa'i las dag byed nad dag ci dang byes dang 'bru mar dag gis ma rung bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dridag gis ma rung bar thur ba ni khrus sa gyon cig/ gang byams ma rung bar smra

194b1: la kyoran cig/ gang 'brumar gyis ma rung bar gyur ba la ni sngas 'dag pa gang yin pas khrus la gyon cig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong rnams zan zab la byin len ma byas par ltung bzad du srung nas the chos skyes te mi za ba dang /
194b2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa/ byin len thos la 'ang shik+ki/ byin len byed pa med nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i zan kor cher long la steng 'or la the tshom du ma byed par zo shig/ khru'i nang du lding nas/ bcom
194b3: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de yang tha na kor cher 'or la zo shig/ gang dge slong dag phongs pa'i tshengs gnang ba de ma phongs pa'i tshe de ltar ma spyod cig/ spyad na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams bsod snyoms la zhugs pa
194b4: dang / rlud dang char dag babs nas lhung bzed kyi nang du rdul song ste/ the tshom skyes nas ma zos te gral na za ba'i tshe yang de bzhin du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams rdul ni rnam pa 'di lnga ste/ rung ba'i rdul dang / mi
194b5: rung ba'i rdul dang / bzhag pa'i rdul dang / ma bzhag pa'i rdul dang rdul gyi rdul dang lnga'o// gzhan yang rdul rnam pa lnga ste/ bza' ba'i rdul dang / btung ba'i rdul dang / gos kyi rdul dang / me tog gi rdul dang / 'bras bu'i rdul te/ mngon par
194b6: gsal ba med pa na de thams cad kyang rung ba yin gyis/ the tshom du ma byed par zo shig/ rkyang ba'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa'o// rkyang ba rnams rdzogs s+ho// 'dul ba gzhung dam pa/ bam po bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa// nongs
194b7: pa dmigs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ mi dmigs pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa mi dmigs pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa gzugs mchis pa zhes bgyi'am/ gzugs ma mchis sa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa gzugs med pa zhes bya'o//
194b8: nongs pa bstan du mchis pa zhes bgyi'am/ bstan du ma mchis pa zhes bkyilam/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa bstan du med pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa bar du thogs pa dang / bcas pa zhes bgyi'am/ bar du thogs pa dang bcas pa zhes mi ba gyi// gsum

195a1: ba nyes pa bar du thogs pa dang bcas pa zhes mi bya'o/ / nongs pa zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bgyi'am/ zag pa ma mchis pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa 'dus byas zhes bgyi'am/ 'dus
195a2: ma byas zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa 'dus byas zhes bya'o// nongs pa 'jig rten pa zhes bgyi 'am 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa 'jig rten pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa phung por gtogs pa zhes bgyi 'am/
195a3: ma gtogs pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa phung por gtogs pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa khams su gtogs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ khams su mi gtogs pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa khams su gtogs pa zhes bya'o// nongs
195a4: pa bzung ba zhes bgyin 'am/ ma bzung ba zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa ma bzung ba zhes bya'o// nongs pa lung bstan pa zhes bgyi 'am/ lung ma bstan pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa lung bstan pa zhes kyang bya/ lung ma bstan pa zhes
195a5: kyang bya'o/ / lung bstan pa gang zhe na/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa bcas pa la bsams bzhin du 'da' bar byed pa ni lung bstan pa zhes bya'o// lung ma bstan pa gang zhe na/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa bcas pa lam bsams
195a6: par 'da' ba ni lung ma bstan pa zhes bya'o/ / nongs pa 'byung ba chen por lung bstan pa zhes bgyi'am/ 'byung ba chen por lung mastan pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa 'byung ba chen por lung bstan pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa kun du sbyor ba zhes bgyi
195a7: 'am mi sbyor ba zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa kun du sbyor ba zhes bya'o// gnongs pa bsgribs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ ma bsgribs pa zhes bgyi/ nyes pa bsgribs pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa nyon momongs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ nyon mongs pa zhes bgyi/
195a8: gsungs pa/ nyon mongs pa zhes kyang bya'o// nyon ma mongs pa zhes kyang bya'o// nyon mongs pa ga zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyis bslab pa bcas pa la bsams bzhin du 'da' ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa'o// nyon ma mongs pa gang zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi

195b1: bslab pa bcas pa la ma bsams par 'da' ba 'di ni nyon ma mongs pa'o/ / nongs pa la zad zing du bcas pa zhes bgyi 'am/ zang zing ma mchis pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa la zang zing du bcas pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa chags pa la gnas
195b2: pa zhes bgyi 'am/ 'byung ba la gnas pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa chags pa la gnas pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa dgrar bcas pa zhes bgyi'am/ dgrar ma bcas pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ dgrar bcas pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa dmigs
195b3: pa zhes bgyi 'am/ mi dmigs pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ mi dmigs pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa sems zhes bgyi 'am/ sems ma lags pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa sems ma yin pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa rnams par smin pa zhes bgyi/
195b4: 'am/ rnam par ma smin pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ rnam par smin pa zhes kyang bya/ ma smin pa zhes kyang bya'o// smin pa gang zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyis bslab pa bcas pa la bsams bzhin du 'das pa 'di ni smin pa zhes bya'o// ma smin pa gang zhe na gang
195b5: sangs rgyas kyis bslab pa bcas pa la ma bsams par 'das pa 'di ni ma smin pa'o/ / nongs pa las shes bgyi 'am/ las ma lags pa shes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa las shes bya'o// nongs pa nang gi skye mched du gtogs pa zhes bgyi 'am/
195b6: phyi'i skye mched du gtogs pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ phyi'i skye ba mched du gtogs pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa sngar 'das pa zhes bgyi 'am/ ma 'ongs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ da ltar 'byung ba zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa snga ma 'das pa zhes
195b7: kyang bya/ ma 'ongs pa zhes kyang bya/ da ltar byung ba zhes kyang bya'o// sngar 'das pa gang zhe na/ nyes pa byung nas bshags shing slar byas pa ni nyes pa de las langs pa ste/ de ni sngar 'das pa zhes kyang bya'o// ma 'ongs pa gang zhe na/ nyes pa
195b8: mthung mod kyi nges par 'byung ba de ni ma 'ongs pa zhes kyang bya'o/ / da ltar gyi gang zhe na/ nyes la byung ba de ni da ltar gyi'o// nongs pa dge ba zhes bgyi'am mi dge ba zhes bgyi 'am/ lung mi ston pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa mi dge ba

196a1: zhes kyang b+ha/ lung du mi ston pa zhes kyang bya'o// mi dge pa gang zhan/ gang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa bcas pa la zhes bzhin du 'das pa 'di ni mi dge ba'o// lung dum bstan bgang zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi bsrab #
196a2: b.lags bzhin du 'da' ba de ni wang dum bstan pa'o/ / nongs pa 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa zhes bgyi'am/ gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa nyes pa
196a3: 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa zhes bya'o/ / nos bslab pa zhes bgyi'am/ mi slob pa zhes bgyi'am/ slob papa ma lags mi slob pa'ang ma lags shes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes paslob pa yang ma yin ma slob pa yang ma yin pa zhes bya'o// sa
196a4: bamathong bas spangs pa zhes bgyi'am/ bsgoms pas spangs pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa bsgoms pas spang ba zhes bya'o// nongs pa lus la byung ba zhes bgyi'am/ ngag las byung ba zhes bgyi 'am/ sems las byung ba zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa nyes
196a5: pa lus las byung ba yang yod/ dag las byung ba yang yod/ sems las byung ba yang yod de/ lus las byung ba gang zhe na/ mi tshangs par spyod par byed pa dang / ma byin pa len par byed pa dang / mi'i 'tsho ba dang bral bar byed pa dang / bsams
196a6: bzhin khra ba 'byin pa dang / lus kyis reg par byed pa dang / rtsa sngon po gcod pa dang / byi dro za ba dang / btung ba chad 'thung ba ni lus las byung ba'o// ngag las byung ba gang zhe na/ gang med la kun med bzhin du dkyil 'khor bla mar gyur ba'i chos
196a7: su bdag nyid smra ba dang / bud med de la nyes pa sbom po'i tshig smra ba dang / bud med kyi mdun du bdag gis lus kyi kun sbyang ba'i yon tan brjod pa dang / bud med la tshig lnga'am drug las lhag par chos bston pa ste/ 'di ni ngag las byung ba'o//
196a8: sems las byung ba gang zhe na/ de 'di ltar dge slong gcig pu dkon pa na gnas na de de na gso sbyin la sems mi skyed/ tshig tu yang mi smra/ de'i sems las byung ba'i nyes pa ma dag pa ste/ 'on kyang 'di skad ces smra'o// sems las

196b1: bung ba'i nyes pa dag med kye 'on kyang 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba mi sbyor ba'o/ / gang gi dngos po las nongs par 'gyur ba de la rtun te ma bgyis na nyes par 'gyur la/ dngos po de nyid la rtun te bgyis kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ gsungs pa
196b2: denges po rtun te ma byas na nyes par 'gyur la rtun te byas na nyes par mi 'gyur ba yod do/ / gang zhe na/ gang dngos po de la rtun te ma byas na/ nyes par 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste/ dge slong gtan pa ma bting bang chos gos ci 'dod pa 'chang ste sbyar ma
196b3: med par grong du 'jug pa dang / 'gron du ma bos par grong du 'jug pa dang / 'dus shing za ba dang / yang yang za ba ni nyes pa'o// gang dngos po de nyid la rtun te byas kyang nongs pa mi 'gyur ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gtan pa btang la
196b4: chos gos ci 'dod pa 'chad ste/ sbyar ma med par grong du 'jug pa dang / 'gron du ma bos par grod du 'jug pa dang / yang yang za ba dang / 'dus shing za ba la nyes pa med do// de ltar na dngos po gang la rtun te byas na nyes par 'gyur ba'i
196b5: dngos po de nyid la rtun te byas kyang nyes par mi 'gyur ro/ / las bgyis na nongs par 'gyur ba'i las de nyid bgyis kyang nongs par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ gsungs pa las byas na nyes par 'gyur ba'i las de nyid byas pa las nyes par
196b6: mi 'gyur ba yang yod do/ / las gang byas pa las nyes par 'gyur ba'i las de nyid byas kyang nyes par mi 'gyur ba gang zhe na/ dge slong rnams kyis dge slong ma mthong ngo zhes nas spangs pa dang / slar las mi byed pa dang / sdig pa la lta ba mi
196b7: gtong ste spangs pa las de dag dge slong rnams la 'byung bar gsol/ spu snyol bar byed pa las 'tshams kyi phyi rol du 'byin na nyes par 'gyur ro// las de nyid byas pa nyes par mi 'gyur ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong rnams kyis dge slong
196b8: ma mthong ngo zhes nas spangs pa dang / slar las mi byed pa dang / sdig pa la lta ba mi gtong ba spangs pa las de nyid kyis dge slong rnams la 'byung bar gsol/ spu snyol bar byed/ thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal bar ston pa de 'tshams kyi nad

197a1: na byung na nyes pa med do/ / de ltar na gang las byas pa las nyes par 'gyur ba'i las de nyid byas kyang nyes pa med do// las de 'tshal kyang nongs par yang 'gyur las de nyid 'tshal na nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ gsungs
197a2: las de shes las nyes par 'gyur ba dang / las de nyid shes la nyes par mi 'gyur ba yod do// ji ltar na las gang 'tshal la nongs par 'gyur la/ las de nyid 'tshal la nongs par mi 'gyur ba lags/ de 'di ltar dge slong rnams
197a3: kyis dge slong ma mthong ngo zhes nas spangs pa dang / slar las mi byed pa dang / sdig pa las lta ba mi gtong bas spangs pa de dge slong rnams las 'byung bar gsol/ spu snyol bar byed/ thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal bar ston pa 'tshams kyi
197a4: phyi rol du phyung nas dge slong rnams de la 'dus par byed/ lhan cig gnas/ gnas khang gcig na lhan cig tu nyal bar byed pa dang / dge slong gzhan dag gis smras pa/ kye tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni dge 'dun 'dus pas chos bzhin
197a5: ma mthong ngo zhes spangs na/ dge slong de la dge slong rnams rjes su 'jug gam zhes smras pa dang / de dag 'di skad ces smra'o// de ni bden te/ dge slong 'di ni dbyung bar gsol spu skol bar byed/ thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal bar ston nas phyung ngo //
197a6: gang du tshams kyi phyi rol du'o zhes smra ba ni nyes bzung ba'o// 'di ltar yang dge slong rnams kyis dge slong ma mthong ngo zhes nas spangs pa dang / slar las mi byed pa dang / sdig pa la lta ba slar mi gtong nas spangs te/ dge slong rnams la dpung
197a7: bar gsol/ spu snyol par byed/ thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal bar ston nas 'tshams kyi nang du phyung ste/ de la dge slong rnams de dag 'dus par byed/ lhan cig tu gnas/ gnas khang gcig na lhan cig tu nyal bar byed pa dang / dge slong gzhan dag gis
197a8: smras pa/ kye tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni dge 'dun 'dus pas chos bzhin ma mthong ngo zhes nas spangs na/ dge slong rnams dge slong de'i rjes su 'jug gam zhes smras pa dang / de dag 'di skad smra'o// de ni bden te dge slong 'di dbyung bar gsol/

197b1: spu snyol bar byed de thal mo sbyar cing phyag 'tshal bar ston nas phyung ngo // gang du 'tshams kyi nang du'o zhes zer na nyes pa med pa'o// de ltar na las shes la nyes par 'gyur ba dang / las de nyid shes la nyes par mi 'gyur ba'o// bdag gis yi dam
197b2: las nongs pa dang gzhan gyi yi dam las nongs par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ gsungs pa/ bdag gi yi dam las nyes pa dang / gzhan gyi yid ma las nyes par 'gyur ba yod do// ji ltar na bdag gi yi dam las nongs pa lags/ de 'di ltar dge slong
197b3: gis nyes pa'i phung po lnga'i nang nas gang yang rung ba'i nyes pa byung nas rang nyid kyis shes pa ni nyes pa'o/ / gzhan gyi yid ma las nongs pa gang lags/ ji ltar yang dge slong gis nyes pa'i phung po lnga'i nang nas gang yang rung ba'i nyes pa byung ba las
197b4: dad pa'i dge bsnyen gyi tshig bzhin nyes pa de chos bzhin du byed pa'o/ / de ltar na rang gis yi dam las nyes pa dang / gzhan gyi yi dam las nyes pa'o// dran pa las nongs par 'gyur ba dang / mi dran pa las nongs par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ gsungs
197b5: ba yod do/ / ji ltar na dran pa las nongs pa lags/ de 'di ltar dge slong nyes pa'i phung po lnga'i nang nas gang yang rung ba'i nyes pa byung bar dran pa da ni dran pa'i nyes pa'o// ji ltar na mi ngan pa las nongs pa lags/ de 'di ltar dge slong nyes pa'i phung
197b6: po lnga'i nang nas gang yang rung ba'i nyes pa byung ba de mi dran te/ des cung zad mi dran du zin kyang de nyes par 'gyur ro// de ltar dran na yang nyes pa yin la/ mi dran kyang nyes pa'o// mngon sum du gyur pa las nongs pa dang / mngon sum ma
197b7: b+hur pa las nongs pa mchis sam/ gsam pa yod// dri sbyar na mngon sam du gyur pa sa nos pa lags/ de 'di ltar dge slong gis nyes pa'i phung po lnga'i nang nas gang yang rung ba'i nyes pa byung ba de ni mngon sum du gyur pa'i nyes pa'o//
197b8: rdo ltar na mngon sum du mgyur pa'i nongs pa lags/ de 'di ltar dge slong gis nyes pa'i phung po lnga'i nang nas/ gang yang rung ba'i nyes pa mabyung yang 'byung bar gdan mi za ba'o// de lta ba ni mngon sum du mthar kyang nyes pa dang / bangon sum

198a1: gyur kyang nyes pa'o/ / dngos po gang gis mi gnas pa dang / dngos po de nyid kyis so sor gnas par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ gsungs pa/ yod do de 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis dge slong ma mthong ngo zhes nas spangs pa
198a2: dang / slar las mi byed pa dang / sdig pa la lta ba slar mi gtong ste/ spangs pa de ni dngos po gang gis mi gnas pa dang / dngos po de nyid kyis so sor gnas pa'o// las gang bgyis pas mi gnas pa dang / las de nyid bgyis pas
198a3: so sor gnas par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ gsungs pa/ las gang byas pas mi gnas pa dang / las de nyid byas pas so sor gnas pa yod de/ ji ltar na las gang byas pas mi gnas shing las de nyid byas pas so sor gnas pa lags/
198a4: de 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis dge slong de ma mthong ngo zhes nas spangs pa dang / slar las mi byed pa dang / sdig pa la lta ba slar mi gtong nas spangs pa de lta bu ni las gang byas pas mi gnas pa'i las de nyid byas kyang so sor gnas pa'o// las gang
198a5: 'tshal na mi gnas par 'gyur ba dang / las de nyid 'tshal na so sor gnas par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ gsung ba/ las gang shes nas mi gnas pa dang / las de nyid shes kyang so sor gnas par 'gyur ba yod de/ ji ltar las gang 'tshal kyang mi
198a6: gnas pa dang / las de nyid 'tshal na so sor gnas par 'gyur ba lags/ de 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis dge slong ma mthong ngo zhes nas spangs pa dang / slar mi byed pa dang / sdig pa la lta ba mi gtong ba'i phyir ma spangs pa de lta bu ni las gang shes kyang mi
198a7: gnas pa dang / las de nyid shas kyang so sor gnas pa'o// rang gi yi dam gyis mi gnas pa dang / rang gi yi dam gyis so sor gnas par 'thung ba mchis sam/ gsungs pa/ rang gi yi dam gyis mi gnas pa dang / rang gi yi dam gyis so sor gnas
198a8: par 'gyur ba yod do/ / ji ltar na rang gi yi dam gyis mi gnas ma pa dang / rang gi yi dam gyis so sor gnas par 'gyur ba lags/ de 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis dge slong ma mthong ngo zhes pa'i phyir spangs pa dang / slar mi byed pa dang / sdig pa la lta bslar

198b1: mi gtong bas spangs pa de lta bu ni rang gi yi dam gyis mi gnas pa dang / rang gi yi dam gyis so sor gnas pa'o// gzhan gyi yi dam las mi gnas pa dang / gzhan gyi yi dam las so sor gnas par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bka' stsal pa/ gzhan
198b2: gyi yi dam las mi gnas pa dang / gzhan gyi yi dam las so sor gnas pa yod de/ ji ltar na gzhan gyi yid ma las mi gnas pa dang / gzhan gyi yi dam las so sor gnas par 'gyur ba lags/ de 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis dge bsnyen nga'i tshis
198b3: bzhin dge slong de ma mthong ngo zhes nas spangs pa dang / slar las mi byed pa dang / sdig pa la lta ba slar mi gtong ba'i phyir spangs pa de lta bu ni gzhan gyi yi dam las mi gnas pa dang / gzhan gyi yi dam las so sor gnas pa'o// dran kyang mi gnas pa dang /
198b4: dran kyang so sor gnas par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bka' stsal pa/ dran kyang mi gnas pa dang / dran kyang so sor gnas pa yod do// ji ltar na dran kyang mi gnas pa dang / dran kyang so sor gnas par 'gyur ba lags/ de 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis
198b5: dge slong ma mthong ngo zhes nas spangs pa dang / slar las mi byed pa dang / sdig pa la lta ba slar mi gtong ba'i phyir spangs pa de lta bu ni dran kyang mi gnas pa dang / dran kyang so sor gnas par 'gyur ba'o// mi dran kyang mi gnas pa dang / mi dran kyang so sor
198b6: gnas par 'gyur bar mchis sam/ bka' stsal pa/ mi dran kyang mi gnas pa dang / mi dran kyang so sor gnas par 'gyur ba yod de/ de 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis dge slong ma mthong ngo zhes nas spangs pa dang / slar las mi byed pa dang / sdig pa la lta ba slar
198b7: mi gtong ba'i phyir spangs pa de lta bu ni mi dran kyang mi gnas pa dang / mi dran kyang so sor gnas pa'o// mngon sum du gyur pa la mi gnas pa dang / mngon sum du gyur pa la so sor gnas par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bka' stsal pa/ mngon sum du gyur pa
198b8: la mi gnas pa dang / mngon sum du gyur pa la so sor gnas pa yang yod do// ji ltar na mngon sum du gyur pa las mi gnas pa las sogs pa lags/ de 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis dge slong ma mthong zhes nas spangs pa dang slar las mi byed pa dang /

199a1: ba/ sdig pa la lta ba mi gtong ba'i phyir spangs pa de lta bu ni mngon sum du gyur pa las mi gnas pa dang / mngon sum du gyur pa las so sor gnas pa'o// mngon sum ma gyur kyang mi gnas pa dang / mngon sum du mthur kyang so sor gnas
199a2: bamachis sam/ gsungs pa/ yod do// ji ltar na mden sum du lung kyang mi gnas pa dang / mngon sum du ma gyur kyang so sor gnas pa lags/ de 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis dge slong gas ma mthong shes nas spangs pa dang / slar las mi byed pa dang /
199a3: sdig pa la lta ba slar mi gtong ba'i phyir spangs pa de lta bu ni mngon sum du ma gyur kyang mi gnas pa dang / mngon sum du ma thur kyang so sor gnas pa'o// dngos po gang gis phyir dge bdun gyisi las bgyi ba dngos po dmang po'am/ gnyis sam/
199a4: gcig gis bgyi ba mchis sam/ gsungs pa/ dngos po gang gi skyer dge 'dun gyis las bgyi ba'i dngos po de mang po'am/ gnyis sam/ gcig gis bya ba yang yod do// ji ltar na dngos po gcig gis dge 'dun gyi las bgyi ba'i dngos po de mang
199a5: po 'am gnyis sam/ gcig gis bgyi bar 'gyur lags/ de 'di ltar dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong la 'phyag mi 'tshal bar bcas pa dang / gtam mi smra bar bcas pa dang / longs spyod mi gcig par bcas nas bsgos pa ste/ de lta bu ni dngos
199a6: po gang ga phyir dge 'dun gyis las bya ba'i phyir dngos po de mang po'am/ gnyis sam/ gcig gis kyang bya'o// las gang dge 'dun gyis las su bgyi ba'i las de mang po 'am/ gnyis sam/ gcig gis kyang de bzhin pa mchis sam/ gsungs
199a7: pa yod do/ / ji ltar snga ma bzhin du dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong la phyag mi 'tshal bar bcas pa dang / gtam ma smra bar bcas pa dang / longs spyod mi gcig par bcas nas/ bsgos pa ste/ de ltar na las gang dge 'dun rtsi las su bya ba'i las
199a8: de mang po 'am/ gnyis sam gcig gis kyang de bzhin no// las 'tshal bzhin du dge 'dun gyis bgyid pa'i las de nyid 'tshal na gnyis sam/ gcig gis kyang de bzhin pa mchis sam/ gsungs pa/ las gang shes bzhin du dge 'dun gyis bya ba'i

199b1: las de nyid kyis shes kyang mang po 'am/ gnyis sam/ gcig gis bya ba yang yod do// ji ltar na las 'tshal bzhin du dge 'dun gyis bskyed pa'i las de nyid 'tshal na mang po'am/ gnyis sam gcig gis bgyi ba lags de 'di ltar dge slong la
199b2: dge slong rnams kyis phyag mi 'tshal par bcas pa dang / gtam mi smra bar bcas pa dang / longs spyod mi gcig par bcas nas bsgos pa de lta bu ni gang shes bzhin du dge 'dun gyis bya ba'i las de nyid shes kyang mang po 'am gnyis sapa
199b3: cig gis kyang de bzhin no/ / rang gi yi dam bzhin dge 'dun la sa mdzad na rang gi yi dam bzhin mang po 'am/ gnyis sam/ gcig gis de bzhin du 'gyur ba mchis sam/ gsungs pa rang gi yi dam bzhin dge 'dun las byed na'ang rang gi mi
199b4: dam bzhin mang po 'am/ gnyis sam gcig bya ba yang yod do// ji ltar na rang gi yi dam bzhin dge 'dun las mdzad pa/ rang gi yi ma bzhin mang po 'am gnyis sam gcig gis bgyi ba lags/ de de sadage slong la dge slong rnams kyis phyag mi byub
199b5: la bcas pa dang / gtam mi smra bar bcas pa dang / longs spyod mi gcig par bcas nas bskos pa de lta bu ni rang gi yi dam bzhin dge 'dun las byed na'ang rang gi yi dam bzhin mang po 'am/ gnyis sam gcig gis kyang de bzhin no// gzhan gyi yi
199b6: dam gyis kyang dge 'dun las mdzad na gzhan gyi yi dam gyis mang po 'am gnyis sam gcig gis kyang de bzhin du 'gyur ba mchis sam/ gsungs pa yod de/ de 'di ltar dge slong la dge slong rnams kyis phyag mi bya bar bcas pa dang / gtam mi smra
199b7: bar bcas pa dang / longs spyod mi gcig par bcas nas bsgos pa de lta bu ni gzhan gyi yi dam gyis kyang dge 'dun las byed na gzhan gyi yi dam gyis mang po 'am/ gnyis sam gcig gis kyang snga ma bzhin no// dran bzhin du'ang dge 'dun gyi las
199b8: mdzad na/ dran bzhin du'ang mang po 'am/ gnyis sam gcig gis kyang de bzhin du 'gyur ba ma mchis sam/ bka' stsal pa/ dran bzhin du'ang dge 'dun gyis las byed na'ang dran bzhin du mang po 'am gnyis sam gcig gis kyang de bzhin du 'gyur

200a1: ba yod do/ / de 'di ltar dge slong la dge slong rnams kyis phyag mi bya bar bcas pa dang / gtam mi smra bar bcas pa dang / longs spyod mi gcig par bcas nas bsgos pa de lta bu ni dran bzhin du rang dge 'dun gyi las byed na/
200a2: dran bzhini du'ang mang po 'am gnyis sam gcig gis kyang snga ma bzhin no// mi dran pa las kyang mchis sam/ snga ma bzhin te mi dran kyang mang po'am gnyis sam gcig zhes bya ba'i bar du de bzhin no// mngon sum du gyur kyang dge 'dun
200a3: gyis las mdzad na/ mngon sum du gyur kyang mang po 'am gnyis sam gcig gis kyang de bzhin du 'gyur ba mchis sam/ gsungs pa/ mngon sum du gyur kyang mang po 'am/ gnyis sam gcig gis de bzhin du 'gyur ba yod de/ de 'di ltar/
200a4: dge slong la dge slong rnams kyis phyag mi bya bar bcas pa dang / gtam mi smra bar bcas pa dang / longs spyod mi gcig par bcas nas bsgos pa de lta bu ni mngon sum du gyur kyang dge 'dun gyis las byed na/ mngon sum du gyur kyang ma/
200a5: po tha ma gnyis sam gcig gis snga ma bzhin no// mngon sum du ma gyur kyang dge 'dun gyisi las bgyis na mngon sum du ma gyur kyang de bzhin du 'gyur ba mchis sam/ gsungs pa yod de/ de 'di ltar dge slong la dge slong rnams kyis phrag
200a6: mi bya bar bcas pa dang / gtam mi smra bar bcas pa dang / longs spyod mi gcig par bcas nas bsgos pa de lta bu ni mngon sum du ma gyur kyang dge 'dun gyis las byed na mngon sum du ma gyur kyang mang po 'am gnyis sam gcig gis kyang snga
200a7: ma bzhin no/ / smra dbab pa'i las bsdigs pa dang / spang ba dang / baspang ba dang / slar bsdum pa bzhin ste/ bsdigs pa'i las su rigs pa las sdud pa dang / bskrad pa dang / slar bsdum pa'i las bgyis na/ bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ bcom ldan 'ad
200a8: kyis bka' stsal pa/ don gang gis dbang du bya ba gsum pa des sam/ lnga po des byas na byas pa zhes bya'o// de ste mdo sde'i dbang gis byed na ma byas pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsdigs pa'ang gzhan/ smad pa'ang gzhan/ bskrad pa'ang gzhan/

200b1: slar bsdum pa'ang gzhan pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa smad pa'i las su rigs pa las bskrad pa dang / spar bsdum pa dang / bsdigs pa'i las bgyis na bkris pa zhes bgyi 'am/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don gang gi dbang du byam pa gsum
200b2: po des sam/ lnga po nges byas na byas pa zhes bya'o// de ste mdo sde'i dbang gis byed na ma byas pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ smad pa'ang gzhan/ bskrad pa'ang gzhan/ slar bsdum pa'ang gzhan/ bsdigs pa'ang gzhan pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bskrad pa'i//
