306a6: 'byor bsod nams dag/ bsams ma thag tu de dag grub gyur cig/ rdza rnga cang te'u bi bad sgra snyan dang / chu mig mche'u rdzing bu steng ka dag/ gser gyi pad ma u dpal pad ma can// zas skom gos nar mu tig nor bu dbyig/ rgyan gser rin chen
306a7: sna tshogs bai dUr+ya/ / de dag bsams ma thag tu grub gyur cig/ 'jig rten gad na'ang sdug bsngal sbra ma byung // sems can gcig kyang mi 'phrod mthong ma gyur// de dag thams cad kha dog rgya cher dang // phan tshun du ni 'od byed 'gyur bar shog/ mi'i
306a8: 'jig rten phun sum tshogs gang yod/ / de dag bsams par skye bar de dag gyur// bsam pa thams cad bsams ma thag tu yang // bsod nams 'bras bus yongs su rdzogs par shog/ spos dang phreng ba dag dang byug pa dang // gos dang phye ma

306b1: me tog sna tshags dag/ ljon shing dag las dus gsum 'bab par shog/ sems can de dag len cing dgar gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa bas ma yas thams cad dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang / rdul bral dri med btan
306b2: pa'i chos la yang / / phyogs bcu rnams su mchod pa byed par shog/ 'gro ba dma' ba thams cad spong gyur cig/ mi khom brgyad po dag las 'das par shog/ dal ba'i rgyal po dam pa thob gyur cig/ rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa thob par shog/
306b3: rtag tu mthon po'i rigs su skye bar shog/ nor dang 'bru'i mjed rnams 'byor gyur cig/ snyan dang grags dang gzugs dang kha dog gis// bskal pa du mar legs par brgyan par shog/ bud med thams cad rtag tu phor gyur te// dpa' zhing rtul
306b4: bod mkhas shing gsal bar shog/ de kun rtag tu byang chub phyir spyod gyur// pha ral phyin pa drag la spyod par shog/ phyogs bcu dag na rin chen shing dbang drung // sangs rgyas bder bzhugs rin chen bai dUr+ya'i// khril bzhugs pa dag ni mthong gyur cig
306b5: chos bstan pa yang de dag thos par shog/ bdag gis sdig pa'i las rnams bsgrubs pa ni// srid pa nyam ngar sngon chad gang bsgrubs pa// sdig las gang dag mi 'dod 'bram thob pa// de dag thams cad ma lus zad gyur cig/ sems can gang
306b6: ngag srid par bcings gnas kun/ / 'khor ba'i zhags pa'i thag pas dam bcings pa// shes rab lag gis bcings pa bkrol bar shog/ sdug bsngal rnams las thar gyur thub gyur cig/ sems can gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dang /
306b7: bar dag 'jig rten khams na gzhan rnams na// bsod nams sna tshogs zab mo rnams byed pa// de dag kun la rjes su yi ngo // lus dang ngag dang yid kyis bsgrub pa yis// bdag gi rjes su yi rang bsod nams des// bdag gi smon grub 'bras
306b8: ba yad par sheg/ byang chub rdzu khral bla med thob gyur cig/ gang dag rtag tu drim bral ba dang // dri med yid kyis phyag 'tshal bsnyad pa dang // yongs su bsngo ba brjod pa 'di yis ni// bskal pa drug bcur ngan sang spong bar 'gyur// tshigs su

307a1: bcad pa brjod pa 'di dag gis/ skyes pa bud med bram ze rgyal rigs las// thal sbyar 'dug ste rgyal ba gang bstod ga/ tshe rabs kun tu skye ba dran par 'gyur// yan lag dbang po kun gyis yan lag brgyan// bsod nams yon tan sna tshogs rnams//
307a2: dang ldan// mi dbang rgyal pos rtag tu de mchod de// de dang de dag tu ni de 'drar 'gyur// gang dag rna ba'i bu kar bshags pa 'di ni grag gyur pa// de dag sangs rgyas gcig gi gnanas dge ba byas ma yin// gnyis lam yin bzhi la ma yin lnga min bcu la min// de dag
307a3: sangs rgyas stong gi gnanas dge ba byas ma yin/ 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las gsungs pa'i smon lam/ rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// 'jig rten 'di'am yang
307a4: ma des pa dang / / mtho ris dag na rin chen mchog yod pa// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i lhar gyur pa// mi mchog de dang 'dir ni mtshungs pa med// de bas 'dir ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa da yis 'dir ni bde legs shog/ zad pa chags bral
307a5: bdud rtsi 'dus ma byas/ / shes pas shAkya thub des rab tu bye// bdud rtsi zhib 'dus byas ma yin pa// chos de dang ni mtshungs pa gang yang med// de bsa'i dang ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa da yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ mchog tu gang 'dod tshul
307a6: bzhin rab tu bstan/ / ston pa bla med rnal 'byor da/ sgrub pa// rdo rje lta bu'i mig gnyis lam mthong ba// ting 'dzin de dang mnyam pa yod ma yin// de bas 'dir ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ gang zag chen po
307a7: brgyad po rab bsngags shing / / gang zag zung bzhir brjod pa de dag ni// drang srong chen po gang zag mtshungs med pa// bde bar gshegs pas sbyin pa'i gnas shes gsungs// de la byin na 'bras bu cher 'gyur te// zhing rab gshin las sa bon btab pa
307a8: bzhin/ / 'di ni dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ gang dag brtan pa'i yid kyis rab brtson zhing // gau ta ma'i bstan la 'jug byed pa// de dag thos nas bdud rtsi mchog thob ste// mun pa bsal nas mya ngan

307b1: 'das thob pa/ / de bas dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar gog/ lta ba 'di la sbyar ma thag tu ni// 'jig tshogs lha dang tshul khrims brtul zhugs dang / the tsom dang ni nyon mongs gsum po dag/ gcig char spangs te 'phags
307b2: pa'i bden mthong ba/ / des na dge 'dun rin chen mthog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ lus sa ma dgag ma 'on te yid kyis kyang // sdig pa rnam gsum nam yang mi byed cing // blo bur byas na'ang 'chab par mi byed la// de ltar de la lta bas 'dzin
307b3: ri byed/ / des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'di ri ni dge bar shog/ de ltar dbang po'i sdong po sar btsugs pa// phyogs bcu'i drung rnams kyis ni mig yo ltar// 'phags pa'i lam gyi dam pa mthong ba yi// gang zag 'phags pa'i
307b4: dge 'dun de bzhin no/ / des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ shes rab zab mos shin tu bstan pa yi// 'phags pa'i bden pa su dag rnam sgom zhing // lus kyang sbyin par yid la byas pas ni// de dag 'jigs pa
307b5: brgyad dang phrad mi 'gyur/ / debs dge 'dun rin chen mchog tugasungs// bden pade yis 'dir ni dge bar she/ de ltar mni rlung gis rab gtor ba// lag tu blangs te ba gang du med pa nyid// de ltar can du stor ba da btang ba'i// sangs rgyas byas rnams patad
307b6: med papa mo/ / des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ sems can gang dag gro dang mi 'thob/ de dag thams cad 'dir ni dge bar shog/ skyon mchog dam paskum
307b7: mchod 'os pa/ / sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal dang 'dir bde legs shog/ sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'grob// de dag thams cad 'dir ni dge bar shog/ nib chags bral lha mis mchod 'os pa// chos la phyag 'tshal dang 'dir bde legs sheg/ sems
307b8: can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'thob/ / de dag thams cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig/ tshogs kyi dam pa lha mis mchod 'os pa/ dge 'dun phyag 'tshal ding 'dir dge bar shog/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lcags gyur te// sa 'am 'on nye bar snang 'khod pa dag skye

308a1: dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing / / nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod par shog/ 'di ni rgyal ba dgra rgyal bde na gang gis// shin du bden pa gsung zhing brtsan med pa// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ de kun 'jigs pa che las thar gyur
308a2: cig/ / rdzogs sangs rnam par sangs rgyas tshe// 'jig rten skyong bas phyogs bzhinas// snod bzhi dag ni blangs nas su// bde bar gshegs la phul ba dang // mthu yis gcig tu sprul mdzad pa// lha'i snong mchog de dang ni/ 'dud rtsi 'dra ba'i sman gyi
308a3: rnams/ / ston pa'i phyag na bzlazlas gyur pa// bden pa'i tshig ni de dag gis// sman rnams bdud rtsir gyur par shog/ de bzhin lha mo 'phrog ma yis// lha rdzas dge ba a ru ra// blangs nas ston la rab phul ba// bdud rtsi 'dra ba'i sman gyi rnams// bden pa'i tshig
308a4: ni de dag gis/ / nad pa rnams kyis nad sel cing // nyes pa thams cad 'phrog byed pa// sman rnams bdud rtsir gyur par shog/ sangs rgyas rnam gzigs gzi brjid dang // gtsug tor can gyis stobs rnams dang / thams cad skyob kyi bden tshig dang // log dang
308a5: sel gyi ting 'dzin dang / / gser zhes bya ba'i ye shes dang // 'od srung gi ni rdzu 'phrul dang // shAkya seng ge'i mthu rnams kyis// sman rnams bdud rtsi gyur par shog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid dang // rang rgyal dag gi gzi brjid dang / dgra bcom rnams
308a6: thu dag dang / / gsang sngags 'dzin pa thams ca dang / nA buM yi shes pa dang / mau gal bu yidri 'phrul dang // ma 'gags pa'i mig dang ni// 'od sung byungs pa'i yon nadang// ko c-i'i rdza ba dang // kun ga po thos pa dang // tshangs
308a7: yin byams pa dang / / brgya byin gyi ni pangar rnams dang / 'jig rten sbyong gi yul rnams dang // dbang phyug chen po'i stobs dag dang // sde pon rnams kyi mthu dag dang // 'brog ma'i ga zi brjid rngu 'phrul dang // de dag rnams kyi mthu dang gcis// bdan na
308a8: drig med sho/ / 'phags pa stod chen mo btu 'joms pa las gsungs pa'i smon la ma rdzogs sa// / sang rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyas parnamag gas bya na tshad laganas// rgyal ba gtsugs

308b1: mdakar po'i drung / / thams cad skyob pas la'i drung na gnas// bram ze 'khor ba 'jig ni shing sha'i drung // sangs rgyas gser thub u dum pari 'dring // 'od srung n+ya gro d+ha'i drung na gnas// shAkya thub mchog khyad par gnas drung ngu// phyin nas byang chub thob gyur ro//
308b2: tam/ sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po de dag la// mngon par dad pa'i lha gang 'khod pa dag/ lha rnams de dag yid dga' mgur gyur nas// rtag tu dge zhing zhi bar byos// rangs a rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rkang gnyis khyed rnams bde legs shog/
308b3: rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog/ lam du zhugs rnams bde legs shog/ phyir 'od dag kyang bde legs shog/ mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs// nyi ma'i gud la bde legs shing // khyed cag kun du bde legs shog/ de dag sdig par mthur
308b4: cig/ nyi ma thams cad dge ba yin// rgyu skar thams cad bzang po yin// sangs rgyas thams cad rdzu 'phrul che// dgra bcom thams cad zad pa med// bden pa'i tshig gis kun du bde legs su gyur cig/ rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo cha bya chen mo las gsungs
308b5: pa'i smon lam dang bden tshig/ rdzogs s+ho// // 6// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gang la ser sna rnam chags pa// rnam 'joms dri ma med mdzad pa// thugs zhig nod pa mi mnga' des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// 'dren
308b6: pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/ / thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing // chos rnams thams cad ston pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi rten// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// gang gis bde ba mda' mjed de// khyed la bde legs
308b7: mdzad par 'gyur/ / skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi// thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun// bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhag 'khor bar 'khor ba yi// sems can kun ci rten gyur cig/ gling dang dpung
308b8: gnyen gyur pa des/ / khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur// gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' ba// gsung gtsang gtsang bar mdzad pa des// byed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// dpa' ba chen po gang skyes pa// phun sum

309a1: tshogs don 'byor gyur cing / / don thub tshogs kyang grub pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig skyes pas ma rnams dang // nags tshal bcas pa rab g.yos nas// sems can thams cad rab dag 'des// khyed la bde legs
309a2: mdzad par 'gyur/ / byang chub snying por gang zhig gis// sa rnams rnam drug g.yos gyur cing // bdud yid mi bder gyur pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na// 'phags pa'i bden pa gsungs pa gang // thub par
309a3: grags pa 'byung ba des/ / khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed// thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing // tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas khyed la bde lags
309a4: mdzang / / brgya ba ni ltar bcas pa de legs dang // 'byung ba kun gyi bde lags ni// khyed ladus kun sbyin gyur cig// sangs rgyas bsod nams mtha~M dag dang // lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yis// khyed kyi don 'dod gang nigadon dade ring thub gyur cig/
309a5: gang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog/ gang ba ni khyed cag bde legs shog/ khyed cag lam 'gro ba de legs shog/ phyir 'od dag kyang bde legs shog/ nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs// nyi ma'i gung la'ang ba de legs shing // khyed rnams kun
309a6: du bde legs shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ sangs rgyas lha ni stong rnams kyis// yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis// sngang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig/ snying rje bdag nyid can rnams 'khor// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams
309a7: da / dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis// 'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams// grong khyer 'di ni gter gyur cig/ sems can kun dang srog chags kun// 'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun// bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig/ thams cad nad na med gyur
309a8: cig/ kun gyis bzang po mthong gyur cig/ gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lcags gyur cing // sa 'am 'on te bar snang gnas pa rnams// skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing // nyin dang mtshan du chos la spyod gyur cig/

309b1: 'dul ba lung gi cha shas yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i bde legs kyi tshogs su bcad pa rdzogs s+ho// // sha// n+ya gar skad du/ swa sti gA hA/ bod skad du// bde legs kyi tshigs su bcang pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// lha
309b2: cig nye bar song nas su/ / lhas mchod pa la du byas te// sangs rgyas chen po thub pa cha// ci zhig smras na bde legs 'gyur// des ni tshig degs na gyur nas// 'jig rten rtsa lag bka' stsal pa// gang zhig rtag tu brjod byed pa// nga yi bde legs 'gyur
309b3: daton/ / 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dang mthongs na// rin chen rgya chen mchog ni gang yod pa// des ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen la// tsaM kyang grangs dang bgrang dang char maphod// ngo mtshar shin du rmad dpung dpag medade// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
309b4: rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin du ba de legs shog/ zhi 'gog bdud rtsi shin du gya nom gang // shAkya thub pas mnyam bzhag thugs chud pa// chos de dang ni mtshungs pa yod min te//
309b5: demangon byas nacan cad mya ngan med// dematshar gnidu ma dbyung dpag med de// dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji lta nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa'i dis ni gan du bde legs gog/ rgyal bas gang dag gang zag brgyad
309b6: gsungs pa/ / de dag rnams ni skyes bzung ba zhi ste// sbyin gnas de dgas stang shin du dkon// de dag rnams la byin na dpag med 'gyur // de mtshar shin du rmad byar dpag med de// dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ji lta nga'i 'di de
309b7: bzhin bden bachog na/ / bden pa 'dis ni shin du ba de legs go// dam pa gan pa mchog spyan rgyanam pa// 'od mtshag dpa' bdam pa mchog gi gnas// shes rab dam pa mchog gi dam pa mjug/ mchag ma na mchog mkhyen 'dan bcom ldan
309b8: gcig/ ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'idi de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog/ ting 'dzin dam pa bar chad med pa gang // mtha' yas

310a1: blo ldan de bzhin gshegs gsungs pa/ / ting 'dzin de bstan rdo rje dper byas pa// ting 'dzin de dang mtshungs pa'i ting 'dzin med// ngo mtshar shin du rma dbyung dpag med de// ting nge 'dzin gyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden
310a2: mchog na/ / bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog/ ji ltar sgo gtan dam zhing rab dam ste// stobs chen rlung bzhi dag gis mi bskyod pa// de ltar mkhas pa bden bzhi mthong gnas pa// 'jig rten smra ba rnams kyis 'dir mi g.yo// ngo mtshar shin du rma byung
310a3: dpag med de/ / dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'di sin shin du bde legs shog/ thams cad zil gnon kun mkhyen thams cad gzigs// thams cad mkhyen pa stobs rnams kun
310a4: dang ldan/ / kun gyi dam pa 'dzin pa kun dang bral// bsam pa kun mkhyen 'di ni bcom ldan cig/ ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni
310a5: shin du ba migs gog/ srid pa 'gog cing migaso 'gyur ba med// skye med 'jigs pa kun las rnam par gral// shin du dgag cing kyi nomo nges par 'byung // shAn du dri med ni bzlas mi 'grags// de mtshar shin du rmang byung dpag med de// dam par
310a6: chos kyi che 'jig nyi mchog/ ji b+ha nga da pani bden mchogs// bde 'di ni shin pa de legs so// shing ga sngal ston c-ing de bye 'i bde rnams thod ste gang dag ga yod pa// bde par na can rnams pa dogs
310a7: gde dag skye ba brgyad pa byis mi len/ / de mchar shin du rmad bang dpag med de// dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bde na mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog/ dam pa rnams kyis dmapa
310a8: don dam mkhyen/ / mchog dang mchog min mkhyen cing don dam brtson// gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs dam pa thugs chud rtogs// shin tu sdug bsngal rnams kyi dpung gnyen mchog/ ngo mtshar shin du rma dbyung dpag med de// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin

310b3: xxx/ xxx
310b4: 'amin she de legs so/ / gcas pa'i 'jig rte tham cadan// sa rgyas dang ni rtag pa ma mtshungs pa skyed// rgyud ma sa thon pa tha med // na pa ded bya rnams kyis ga/ de shin du dang byung dag da / rje
310b5: pa'i sas rgyas chen 'jig na ma ga/ di bzhin de brtog // de pa dis ni shid de legs so// so ga'i u0f88u0f90 'du pa rnapa // dgas thod chos kyi ma pa dab brnyes pa// chos dang ni lhag pa 'ab bzungs pa med/
310b6: 'di 'a de ga grangs su ldan pa 'gyur// ngo bcar shin du mang gyur dpag med de// dam pa'i chos kyi ni chen 'jig rted mchog/ ji lta pa'i 'di bzhin pade bcog na// bde pa dis di shin du bye de legs gog/ sdig pa rnying bdags dang bya med// ri
310b7: dad med pas 'jigs med mya nathal/ / srid pa 'gags pas cab bskyed pa// bstan pa mar me bzhin du bar bar 'gyur// ngo mtsha shin du ma dbyung dpag med de// dge 'dun rin chen ga shig 'jig rten ma ga/ ji ster pa'i 'di bzhin bden mchog na
310b8: bded pa 'dis shi du bdi rigs shog/ bdi legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// / rgyag dag du/ swa s+ya lan thAg+sa/ bdaska dadu/ bde legs su 'gyur pa'i tshigs su bcadapa/ thams cad mabyed pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten na

311a1: xxx/ xxx
311a2: pa nyon/ / gang ni ga de bzhin gshegs pa la// dang ba tshig yo legs rapa bstan// gang shig dge chub thams can// de dag kun du de legs 'gyur// gang nag pa dang mdag dang / bu dang bum bra dag la// rtag tu lags par bsnyen bkung ba// dad/
311a3: kun du ba de legs 'gyur// gang shig dgra btsam grags pa la// legs par ya dang yan 'dral dang / lha yi bka' ba nin byed pa dag/ de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur// gang gis pus dang ga dang ni// yid la nyis byas med pa dang / gang zhig nas gsu
311a4: rab bsdams pa/ / de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig 'byung po thams cad la// tshad med kun du mi 'khrugs pa// byams pa'i sems ni sgom byed pa// de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig sdug bsngal kun spang phyir// 'phags pa'i lam
311a5: gyi yan lag brgyad/ / bde ba 'dren pa legs sgom pa// de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur// gang gis 'dus byas thams cad kyi// stong nyid rtag du legs mthong zhing // de ni sems la gnas gyur pa/ de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur// gang gis lus kyis dri
311a6: med chos/ / mngon sum byas nas rgyu ba dang // dgra bcom rnam grol sems ldan pa// de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur// gang gis 'dod chags zhe sdang dang // tig mug rnams dang chags bral zhing // ye shes 'khrug med skyes gyur pa// de dag kun du bde leg 'byur
311a7: gang zhig lhar bcas 'jig rten gyi/ / mgon po lang srid spangs pa yi// sangs rgyas khong du chud gyur pa// de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur// bde legs su 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// // shes par brjod pa'i tshogs su bcad pa/
311a8: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i bkra shis don sgrub cing // phyogs rnams bkra shis byed pa des// khyed kyi don rnams grub gyur cig/ thams cad myur du bathun par shog/ phreng ba mgo la 'dug pa ltar// lag pa g.yas na dpal yod

311b1: shog/ / g.yon 'a dpal na gnas gyur me// yan la gastanan 'dapa' ya gag/ tshad ba dganan tsha ba da// phyogs su dag na 'grob rnams// rnyed pa chen pa rnyed gyur cing // de dag pade ba skyed par sho// dgos pa la la gang gi phyir//
311b2: shar phyo/ pasu ni 'gro ba na// gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi// phya gar khyed la sod gyur cig/ smin drug dang ni sbyar ma dang // mgo dang lag dang nam so dang / rgyal dang sgragacis bya ba ste// de dag rnam ni shar phyogs 'a// rgyu gar bdun po dngag na//
311b3: 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa// shar phyogs logs na yod ces brta// dag byed la kun du bsrung // de dag bdag po rgyal po ni// yul 'khor bsrung zhes grags pa ste/ de ni dri zakun gyi bdag/ zhim lhan cig bsru ba sho// de 'a bu ni yang yod pa/ sa shing ming yang 'thun pa ste//
311b4: dgra cu cag cig zad par yang // dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// de rnams khyed la nad med cing // shes par lhag par myong gyur cig/ shar phyogs logs kyi phyogs can// lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod // rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ba dang // don thub ma dang /
311b5: mi ba ma dang // dga' mchog ma dang dga' sde dang / dga' can ma dang dga' 'phelas// de dag khyed la nad med cang // shis par lhag par spyod par shog/ shar phyogs logs kyi phyogs chan// bzhi 'dzin cem bya'i mchod rten yod// rgyal bltab bdagra
311b6: bcom pa/ / de rnams kyis ni bzhugs shing mkhyen// da yang khyed la nang med cing // shes par lhag par skyong gyur cig/ phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ lha rnam pa kun gyis rab bsrungs nas// nor rnams rnyed
311b7: de ldog par shog/ dgos pa la la gang gi phyir// lho phyogs su ni 'gro ba na// gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi// rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig/ mchu dang gra dang dpo dang ni// me bzhin ga pa lnga pa yin// sar dang ni sa ga ste// de dag rnams ni lto phyog
311b8: pa/ rgyu bar bdun po de dag ni// 'jig rten skyong pa thags ldan pa// lho phyogs logs na yod ces bstan// de dag khyed la kun du bsrungs// de dag dag ba rgya po ni// 'phags skyes po zhes bya bar brjod// de ni grul bum kun gyi bdag/ gshin rje ba

312a1: stan cig bsrungs par shog/ de la tha ni ma yod pa// mkhas shing ming yang 'thun pa ste// dgra bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang// dbang po zhes bya stabs pa che// de rnams khyed la nad med cing // shis par lhag par snang gyur cig// lha phyogs logs
312a2: kyi phyogs chen/ / lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de// dpal ldan ma dang grags ldan ma// grags pa thob dang grags 'dzin dang // legs par langs dang rab ldang dang // legs par sa dadang bde sgrub ma// de dag khyedade la nad med cing // shis par lhag par sbyong bar
312a3: shog/ lho phyogs logs kyi phyogs chan// pad ma zhes bya'i mchod rten yod// rtag du gzi brjid kyis kyang 'bar/ rtag tu thams cad gsal byed pa// de yang khyed la nad med cing // shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig/ phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog/
312a4: khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas// nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog/ dgos pa la la gang gi phyir// nub phyogs su ni 'gro ba na// gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yis// rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig/ lha 'tshams dang
312a5: ni snron dang yang / / brtson 'grus brtan ldan snrums dang ni// chu stod chu smad byi zhin dang // gro zhin de ni bdun pa yin// rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni// 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa// nub phyogs logs na yod ces bstan// de dag khyed la kun du bsrungs//
312a6: de dag bdag po rgyal ba ni/ mig mi bzang zhes bya bar shes// de ni klu rnams kun gyi bdag/ chu lha lhan cig bsrung bar shog/ de la bu ni mang yod la// mkhas shing ming yang 'thun pa ste// dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang // dbang po zhes bya stobs
312a7: po che/ / de dag khyed la nad med cing // shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig/ nub phyogs logs kyi phyogs chan// lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de// rna cha smra 'dres ma dang ni// pad ma dkar dang skya reng dang // cha med gcig dang dgu pa dang // rol dang
312a8: gnag dang stabs myur srid/ / de dag khyed la nad med cing // shis par lhag par skyod par shog/ nub phyogs logs kyi phyogs chan// nub ces bya ba'i ri bo yod// nyi ma zla ba gnyis ka'ad nub// nub pa'ang khyed la nor sbyin 'gyur// de yang khyed la

312b1: nad med cing / / shis par lhag par spyong gyur cig/ phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas// nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog/ dgos pa la la gang gi phyir// byang phyogs suni 'grob na
312b2: gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi/ / rgyusar byed la skyong gyur cig/ mon gru dang na mon me dang // rnams stong dang ni khrums smad dang // nam grwa dang ni tha skar dang // banye ste na bdun pa yin// rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni// 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa/ byang
312b3: phyogs logs na yod ces bstan/ / de dag khyed la kun du bsrungs// de dag bdag po rgyal po ni// mi la zhon pa lus ngan po// gnod sbyin kun gyi bdag po ste// nor bzangs lhan cig bsrung bar shog/ de la bu ni mang yod la// mkhas shing mir yang
312b4: ma 'thun pa ste/ / dgra bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang // dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// de dag khyed la nad med cing // shes par lhag par sbyong gyur cig/ byang phyogs logs kyi phyogs chan// lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de// rab chags lha mo gtor lha mo//
312b5: sa dang de bzhin pad ma can// rgyal po che la nyer gnas dang / re dang khrel yod dpal ldan ma// de dag khyed la nad med cing // shis par lhag par skyong bar shog/ byang phyogs logs kyi phyogs chan// spos ngang ldang ba'i ri bo yod// gnod sbyin 'byung
312b6: po rnams kyi gnas/ rtsem sna chags bstan sdug/ de yang byed la nad med cig// shes par lhag par myong gyur ci// phyogs na kyad cag bde ba shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur gyi// lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas// nar rnams rnyed/
312b7: ldog par shog/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa// phyogs bzhi dag na bdun bdun gnas// lha yi bu mo sum bcu gnyis// phyogs bzhi dag na brgyad brgyad gnas// dge sbyong brgyad dang bram ze brgyad// yul rnams na ni grong rdal brgyad// dbang por
312b8: bcas pa'i lha brgyad rnams/ / de dag byed la kun du bsrungs// khyed cag 'gron 'dabs shis gyur// ldog pa na yang bkra shis shog/ gnyen la sta babs shis shes shog/ gnyen gyi lta ba'adabs shes shig/ dbang bcas gnad byin rgyal

313a1: yangs da/ sa// thams ca na pa gas nga// gas par grug/ mas pa da ga ni da rgyas dang / ga pa yang rnam rnams dang // rlu gan rtags sa sas//
313a2: xxx/ xxx
313a3: dkon mchog gsum gyi bas shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// che ba'i tshe mchog ston mchog bla na med// chos rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i byini rlabs kyis// bdud dang bgegs rigs gnod pa'i dgra zhi ste// rtag tu
313a4: dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ chos nyid bden pa'i chos mchog bla na med// dam ches bdud rtsi bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis// nyes pa'i skyon bral dge tshogs rnam 'phel ba// rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/
313a5: dge 'dun yon tan rin chen dpal 'bar ba// rgyal sras phan mdzad bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis// nyon mongs sdug bsngal gdung ba'i dgra zhi ste// rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ tshangs dang lha dbang bsrungs ma'i byin rlabs kyis
313a6: phan mdzad lha yi bkra shis gnas gyur te/ / bde legs bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub pa dang // tshe ring nad med bde sgyid ldan par shog/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag nges pa la
313a7: gsungs pa/ rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tri dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis
313a8: thugs rje chen po mnga' ba 'od srung rigs skyes pa/ / rnam par rgyal bar gshegs gyur pa// das ni 'dir yang bkra shes legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// gser thub bsgribs pa med par rab tu gzigs pa de/ rin chen sna tshogs

313b1: gshegs gyur pa/ / des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// gsod skyabs gser gyi ra bo 'brang ba 'dra ba de// rtse mo mchog tu gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shas
313b2: dam pa gang zhig gis/ thams cad mnga' ba dgra bcom dri ma gsum sel ba// mdzod spu'i rtse mor gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// sangs rgyas gtsug tor dgongs pa zil gyis mi non pa/
313b3: rin chen sna tshogs gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// rnam par gzigs pa skye sa bu'i zla ba mi yi mgon// rin chen rgyan du gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs
313b4: gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// shin du rgyas pa don dam mkhas shing brtan pa de// ma la ya yi rtser gshegs pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ des ni 'dir yang bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// sangs rgyas ston mchog
313b5: thogs pa mi mnga' ba/ / dri med zla bar gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// grags pi dri ma med par mgon po pad ma'i blo// dri ma med par gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis
313b6: legs kyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// mgon po mar me mdzad pa 'od snang mnga' bde// 'od zer dra bar gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po po rgya byin gyis bkra shis tshigs su
313b7: bcad pa'o/ / / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// sangs rgyas grags pa'i dam par mtshan btags pa// nor bu'i gtsug tu gshegs pa ltar// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig
313b8: bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ / 'jig rten sgron ma blo zhes mtshan btags pa// sbyangs pa'i lam du gshegs pa ltar// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// bsgribs med gzigs pa 'dzum pa'i spyan du

314a1: mtshan btags pa/ / brgyan gcig ldan par gshegs pa ltar// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// 'jig rten sgron ma mar me mdzad ces mtshan btags pa// rnam par rgyal bar gshegs pa
314a2: ltar/ des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// bde gshegs yang dag don gzigs pa zhes mtshan btags pa// dri med rtse mor gshegs pa ltar// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bkra shis
314a3: dam pa gang zhig gis/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rang byung mchog ces mtshan btags pa// rin chen spos su gshegs pa ltar// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// 'jig rten sgron ma dbyig gi lha zhes mtshan
314a4: btags pa/ / dri med sna tshogs gshegs pa ltar// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// 'gro ba med pa smra ba'i stag ces mtshan btags pa// thams cad tshal du gshegs pa ltar// des ni 'dir yang
314a5: bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// yon tan kun mda' dpal gyi rgyal bar mtshan btags pa// dga' ba'i rgyan du gshegs pa ltar// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis
314a6: 'jig rten phan brtson dka' thub drag por mtshan btags pa/ / kun nas mchog tu gshegs pa ltar// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ ces bya sa ni bcom ldan 'das la lha'i rgyal po rab mtshems bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa'o//
314a7: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// chags pa med pa'i zla bar mtshan gsol mtshan btags pa// pho brang mchog tu rab gshegs pa// des ni 'drir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa
314a8: gang zhig gis/ / ye shes mtha' yas dbang zhes bya bar mtshan btags pa// kha dog gser du rab gshegs pa/ des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// kun du mtha' yas spyan zhes bya bar mtshan

314b1: btags pa/ / pad ma'i rtsi mdor ba gshegs pa// des na 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur mo// bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// yan lag rin pa che zhes bya bar mtshan btags pa// rin chen mdzod du rab gshegs pa//
314b2: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// dpal rab rgol ba'i stag ces bya bar mtshan btags pa// dbang po'i khang par rab gshegs pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/
314b3: bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// yon tan thams cad ston pa'i nyi mar mtshan btags pa// me tog snying por ra ba gshegs pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// yan lag 'od zer
314b4: mtha' yas par ni mtshan btags pa/ / shing gis brgyan par rab gshegs pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// mgon po the tsom 'joms pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan de// rin chen
314b5: khang par rab gshegs pa/ / des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// mi yi seng ge ye shes sgron ma mtha' yas pa// spos kyi rtse mamor rab gshegs pa// des ni 'dar yang bkra shas leg sa
314b6: gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyis 'byung gnas 'od mnga' ba// nor bus brgyan par rab gshegs pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'i rgyal po rab
314b7: dga' ldan gyis bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// / de ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa gsum gyis// bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams ni shin du rgyas pa chen po'i sde
314b8: sangs rgyas phal po che las gsungs pa'o/ / #// rgya gar skad du/ de ba ba ri brits+tshi maM ga la gA thA/ bod skad du// lhas zhus pa'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa// dkon mchog gsum

315a1: ma d+ya/ 'tshal lo// gzhan gyis mthub rdzogs sangs rgyas// mnan pa phyags cag pa zugs pan// cag dpa' can po'o// phyag 'tshal 'di / dachagagasas to// dag don du gta yan// b+ha dang
315a2: ma rnams so so nas/ / bkra shis dag ni brjod pakyis na// bkra shis dam pa gang zhig lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge ba don du gnyer ban// lha dang ma rnams so so nas// bkra shis rnams na brjod byed pa// de dag
315a3: bkra shis brjod par bya/ / yul bzang gnas dang grogs mchog dang // sngon chad bsod nams bya ba dang // sems ni legs par gtang byas pa// de ni bkra shis dam pa yin// sbyin dang shin du snyan smra dang // yang dag don la rnam des dang //
315a4: khrims ldan rnams dang mtshungs sbyor ba// de ni bkra shis dam pa yin// byis pa rnams la mi brten dang // mkhas pa rnams la brten pa dang // mchod 'os rnams la mchod byed pa// de ni bkra shis dam pa yin// pam bsnyen bkur byed pa dang //
315a5: zhi dang tshangs par spyod pa dang / 'byung po kun la snying brtse ba// de ni bkra shis dam pa yin// sdig pa'i las las ldog pa dang // dge ba'i las la brten pa dang // bag yod pa dang rten mkhas pa// de ni bkra shis dam pa yin// nga rgyal med dang khengs
315a6: med dang / / chos shes 'thun pas 'tsho ba dang // rtag tu byas pa gzo byed pa// de ni bkra shis dam pa yin// mi smad de bzhin bzod pa dang // 'phags pa rnams dang 'thun sbyor dang / dus skabs su ni chos nyan pa// de ni bkra shis
315a7: dam pa yin/ / le lo med dang mang thos dang // chos la legs par rnam des dang // de bzhin sems la rnyog med pa// de ni bkra shis dam pa yin// gang zhig sems can thams cad la// byams pa'i sems ni rab sgom zhing //
315a8: dpag tu med de mi 'khrugs pa// de ni bkra shis dam pa yin// gang zhig 'phags pa'i bden rnams la// shes rab mag ni rnam sbyangs dang // tshul khrims nongs par ma gyur pa// de ni bkra shis dam pa yin// 'phags

315b1: xxx/ xxx
315b2: don lags dam pa yan/ / 'dza rten ces rnams kyis pastod // gang gisims namags dang // da dang bya na med// da da grags dam pa yod// deng nan ca gas pa // pags dag de// ma
315b3: gang zhig ba stang bya ba/ / de la rtag tu pakra shis 'gyur// lhas zhus pa'i bkra gas kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzugs
315b4: rgyal rigs gzi brjid can/ / tshe lo brgyad khri'i dris na grong khyer mdzes ldan du// shi ri sha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ bde gshegs gtsug tor mnga' ba rgyal rigs
315b5: rdzu 'phrul can/ / tshe lo bdun khri'i dus na suka 'i grong khyer du// shing mchog sun d+ha'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// ding 'dir bde gshegs bkra shes phun sum tshogs gyur tsag/ rgyal ba thams cad skyob pa rgyal rigs blo gros can/
315b6: che lo drug khri'i dris na grong khyer mnyam med du// shing mchogs la'i drung du mngon par sangs rgyas pa// ding 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ thub pa 'khor ba 'dzag ni bcom ldan bram ze'i rigs// tshe lo bzhi khri'i
315b7: dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du/ / shi ri sha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// ding 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phum tshogs gyur cag/ 'dren pa gser thub bslab pa mchog ldan bram ze'i rigs// tshe lo sum khri'i dus na grong khyer
315b8: bde ldan du/ / u dum pa ri'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// ding 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ skyob pa 'od srung rgyal rigs bla med yon tan can// tshe lo nya khri'i dus na bA rA Na sI r+ra// n+ya gro d+ha yi shing //

316a2: xxx/ xxx
316a3: tsam ng+ya na ma dag rten thal mas ldan pa / / de sa gshegs pa cags can pa chags par tse// sang rgyas pas bdun gags gas su das/ dzags//
316a4: rgyag sad du/ maM ga la swAH/ bod skad du/ bsha shis tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// phun su ma tshogs pa mnga' bogs kyor bo 'dra// 'jig rten gsum gyi mag
316a5: po dri mi gsum spangs pa/ / sangs rgyas pad ma rgyas pa'i mdab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba// bkra shis des ni skye dgu zhi byed dang po'o// de yis nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab mi g.yo ba// 'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis
316a6: mchod pa/ / chos kyi dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa// de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa'o// dge 'dun dam pa'i chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis phyug/ mi dang lha dang lha ma yin gyis mchod pa'i gnas// tshogs kyi mchog
316a7: rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi gzhi/ / de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa'o// sems can kun la phan phyir byang chub mnga' ba po// don rnams thams cad 'grub par brtul ba yongs ldan pa// tshogs kyi lam dgyes thub pa'i bkra
316a8: shis gang byud ga/ / krazhis de ni skyed bu rnabs pa'i byed shog/ 'grol phan phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ldan lha'i// gzhal med khang gi snying po nas ni 'dir gshegs te// dbang bcas lha yis bskor ba'i bkra shis ga byung ba//

316b1: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la ni byed shog/ pho ma me tog 'od 'bar nyams dga' lum pa'i tshal// lha mang dag gis bsten par mgon po bltam pa na// srid pa'i mthar phyin pa yi bkra shes gang byung ba// bkra shis des na skye
316b2: dgu mas la ni byed shog/ grong khyer ser skya'i gnas nas rgyal po 'pho brang du// skums nas bltam paston pa bde gshegs zas gtsang sras// myur bskrun bdud rtsi'i chus gtor ba yi bkra shis gang // bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams
316b3: la'i byed shog/ grong khyer dam pa ser skya'i gnas zhes bya bar ni// rmad du grags pa che ba'i lha yis mngon bstod pa// bsam yas dge bsgrubs bsod nams phung po'i bkra shis gang // bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed nan/
316b4: dgyes shing nam phyed grong khyer mchog nas mngon byung ste// dga' thub tshal du mngon par gshegs shing tshangs la sogs// lha yi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i bkra shis pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ rab tu
316b5: 'od 'bar gser dang 'dra ba'i sku mda' zhing / / bai dUr+ya ltar sngo ba'i rtsi ba ting steng bzhugs te/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas mi g.yo mchog gi bkra shis gang // bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la ni byed shog/ chu bo'i 'graman tsa sha'i phreng gis
316b6: yongs bskor ba/ / shin du rmad du byung ba'i srid pa sel mdzad pa// klu yi rgyal pos phyag byas pa yi bkra shis gang / bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ shing rgyal drung gshegs byams pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi phyogs
316b7: mang po btul tes steng dang ni nam mkha' la/ / bcom ldan bkra shis rnam pa sna tshogs gang byung ba/ bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ sdug bsngal mtha' dag gzhig phyir rdo rje'i gdan bzhugs te// nam gyi tho rangs
316b8: bdud bzhi po dag rnams btul ba/ / ston pa bde bar gshegs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ grong khyer bA rA Na sIr drang srong mchog bzhugs te// chos kyi 'khor lo mchog

317a1: bstan pa yi bkra shis gang / / lha yul deng 'dir shin du rmad du byung gyur pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ bkra shis gang zhig phan byed dam pa dag byed pa// bsod
317a2: nams bya byed 'phags pa'i skye bos mngon bstod pa/ / bcom ldan shAkya thub pa'i seng ges gang gsungs pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ mu stegs byed pa kun gyi nga rgyal gzhom pa dang // 'gro la bde
317a3: ba bskyed phyir chos 'phrul dam pa dag/ nye bar ston pa rgyal ba'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog// 'grol phan phyir mtho ris nas ni 'dir gshegs te// tshangs pa la sogs lha tshog
317a4: lag na rnga yab gdugs/ / sna tshogs thogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i bkra shis gang // bkra shis des ni ske dgu rnams la zhi byed sheg/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba mchog tu nyer gshegs pa// man dA ra ba'i ma
317a5: tog mang pos mngon mchod pa/ / lha mchog rnams kyis mngon par bstod pa'i bkra shis gang // bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ lha dbang klu dang mi yi dbang pos phyag byas pa// mkha' lding gnod
317a6: sbyin dri za'i dbang pos mchod gyur pa/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ldan pa'i bkra shis gang // bkra shi so des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ dkon mchog gsum dang mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi
317a7: bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na me tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
